text:
Kami menginap di Mahagiri pada awal September 2012 untuk dua hari pertama dari perjalanan kami ke Bali. Vilanya sangat indah, baru dan bersih dengan banyak fasilitas (dapur yang lengkap, piring, peralatan makan, berbagai macam gelas, pembuka botol, dll.), ada dua TV LCD (meskipun kami tidak pernah menontonnya), kolam renang berukuran cukup besar dengan aliran air seperti sauna dan penerangan di waktu malam. Tidak menemukan kekurangan - vila ini luar biasa. Hotelnya sendiri agak kecil - hampir tidak ada ruang: jadi Anda pada dasarnya tidak dapat ke mana-mana selain tinggal di dalam vila Anda karena letak hotel terpencil. Dan itu satu-satunya sisi negatif yang dapat saya temukan. Tetapi mereka memiliki antar jemput gratis ke pantai Dreamland dan Jimbaran. Para pegawainya luar biasa, mereka selalu tersenyum, mereka benar-benar gembira dan baik terhadap Anda. Sarapan paginya berkualitas bagus bergaya prasmanan: telur yang sangat enak, kue croissant dan danish yang baru matang, beberapa masakan Indonesia. Tetapi jusnya sangat buruk: saya pikir untuk kira-kira 6-8 orang yang menginap di Mahagiri mereka seharusnya dapat menyediakan jus yang baru dibuat atau yang berkualitas bagus. Kami pergi ke restorannya dua kali: pertama sangat lezat (iga babi, tunanya enak!), yang ke dua masih enak tetapi tidak seenak yang pertama (sepertinya mereka memakai koki lain pada hari itu).

Saya dengan senang hati mengusulkan hotel ini pada orang-orang yang mencari privasi dan yang berbulan madu dan seharusnya mau memberi peringkat 4,5 tetapi sayangnya tidal ada opsi ini. Kami benar-benar menikmati menginap di Mahagiri dan terima kasih BANYAK untuk semua orang yang telah menjadikan pengalaman menginap kami di Bali sangat indah.
title: Vila yang sangat indah tetapi tempatnya terlalu kecil dan tidak dirawat dengan baik.

photos.caption: View on the villa from the front door (1 bedroom villa)

text:
Malam terakhir kami di Mahagiri Villas Dreamland yang bagi kami merupakan tempat yang luar biasa untuk menghabiskan kunjungan wisata yang sempurna. Pertama-tama kami disambut di meja depan oleh minuman yang menyegarkan dan handuk yang juga menyegarkan, sebelum mereka membawa kami ke salah satu vilanya. Saat memasuki pintu depan yang terbuat dari kayu ada kolam yang berkilau dengan area dapur dan lounge yang lengkap dengan TV, jika kita perlu. Kamar tidurnya dilengkapi oleh perabotan yang fantastis, TV dan pencahayaan yang romantis. dekat dengan tempat tidur ada 2 wastafel untuk mencuci tangan dan cermin yang menghubungkan kamar ke kamar mandi dengan shower dan toilet. Juga ada shower di luar yang menghadap ke kolam. Tamannya indah dipenuhi oleh tanaman-tanaman tropis, mirip dengan taman yang pernah kami temui di Mandurah tetapi tentu saja luasnya tidak sebesar itu. tempat ini membuat saya merasa seperti di rumah sendiri dan saya memang sangat memerlukannya untuk menyempurnakan liburan kami. Kami sangat berterima kasih terhadap manajer Gusti untuk segala yang telah ia lakukan dan jika anda memutuskan untuk mengunjungi Mahagiri Villas, bisa menghubungi beliau : Gusti Bawana di no tlp : +62 3618481223, Anda tidak akan kecewa. Kunjungi juga situs nya di www.mahagirivillasdreamland.com.

Like  (suka) ·
title: Tempatnya romantis dan cukup tenang

text:
The rooms are amazing. We were upgraded from a one bed pool villa to a three bed, Pure luxury. Staff are wonderful - and very polite. Housekeeping is speedy and efficient

We only had breakfast and to be honest the evening meals didn't sound exciting - but there are plenty of good places nearby.

Shuttle bus to the beach but it's cheap to get a taxi too
title: A wonderful stay

text: My partner and I were absolutely taken away with the beautiful one bedroom villa with a private pool to ourselves, way worth the $$ spent! The outside showers were amazing and room nice a spacious, the only downside was the food was very average and the smoothies tasted like milk with a hint of flavour! Also coffee wasn’t that great (pretty sure they just used instant) but the beauty of this place made up for this, we just ate elsewhere! We will definitely be going back
title: Beautiful

text: A great place to stay for our group of 6 guests. Very private, excellent facilities in room. Gym not equipped so we'll, but if your there to relax, then who needs a gym, right? So close to the very popular GWK, Dreamland beach and Omnia. Staff were very helpful, breakfast was always on time and fresh. Recommend the daily cocktail specials. Housekeeping not always reliable, but overall we had a great time and would stay again.
title: Mahagiri Dreamland Uluwatu

text: Stayed here for two nights because we were attending a wedding in a resort nearby. We had a villa with three bedrooms and a common area. All equipment worked fine. One of the bedrooms had however not been used for a while as there were molds in the inside of the cabinet. The staff cleaned this satisfactory, we did however had some issues with ant-like small insects falling from the rustic ceiling on the bed. The pool was great. During our stay the restaurant was closed for renovation, so breakfast was served in the villa at no extra charge. The first morning only a part of the ordered breakfast arrived, but the misunderstanding was solved reasonably fast.
title: OK place but minor issues

photos.caption: Entrance gate and common area of the villa (left)
Pool with two of the bedrooms

text:
All was perfect from beginn to end. Thanks for all
Very friendly staff , thanks the friendly driver, wich bring us to airport , the service in the villa, the warm welcome ...
Ever come back, when stay in bali 👏
Dagmar Rücker
title: Perfect  stay

text:
We stayed here for 1 night and really enjoyed the villa. It was much larger than expected and featured a private pool. We found the villa in good condition and clean. It was a bit dated, some of the furniture was a bit old and ugly. Everything seemed to work okay and was clean. We dined in the restaurant and enjoyed the food, although small portions and quite expensive. The location was a bit out of the way but the staff arranged motorbike hire for us which was good. We also were able to arrange taxi through the staff (cheaper than airport shuttle). 
Overall nice place that needs a minor modernisation.
title: Large and opulent private villa

text: My wife and I stayed here for a bit of R&R before our baby is due. We found the Villas to be excellent overall, with just a few small issues (no drawers or anywhere to lie your suitcase, as an example). Bed was comfy, and the pool was lovely. Breakfast was good, but a little limited in choice. If you are hungry, go the American breakfast as it includes a bread/pastry basket...strangely you can't have a smaller dish like eggs benedict with the bread basket. Location of Villas - not much around within walking distance, we saw this as a positive however. Yet location is very central to access Dreamland beach, Jimbaran bay and Uluwatu. Service was fantastic, the team was only too happy to accommodate us. They probably need to be better versed on restaurants to recommend though. Highly recommend and would definitely return.
title: Babymoon

text: Very personal service. All staff address you by name. Free shuttle service to jimbaran and dreamland beach. Lovely breakfast and prompt room service. Less touristy location so a nice place for a romantic getaway or a beach and pool chill out holiday.
title: Beautiful secluded location

text:
we have just returned home from an amazing stay at Mahagiri.
The villa's are just beautiful and very private.  There are only 7 villa's at the resort and the staff ensure they know guests names and really provide a personal touch.
Te villa's are situated between Jimbarran and Uluwatu.  Transport is provided free each day to Jimbarrran and the local beach, restaurants and spas.  Also to the  supermarket whenever required.  All of the staff were very friendly and attentive.  Could not recommend staying here more.
title: perfect relaxation

text:
My husband and I stayed here for our honeymoon and we had the most amazing time!!
The private villa with pool was stunning and so clean. The staff were fantastic, everyone single one! 
Thank you for making our honeymoon unforgettable. We will definitely be back!
title: Honeymoon

text: We decided that on our first trip to Bali we wanted to see both ends of Bali so we chose to stay at Mahagiri - the villa was beautiful we had the 3 bedroom but they closed off 2 rooms as we only booked a 1 bedroom. This was perfectly fine as we got a bigger area :) We were stoked with the room and the pool area. We ordered in room dining for Lunch & Dinner the first night as we decided to have a chill out night and the food was really good my husband loved the calamari! Breakfast was also yummy. I have to give a shout out to Ayu for her service in booking us in, and Ade & Budhi in the restaurant (these guys were lovely). The only downside we found was the spa. We went to book but no one was downstairs, then we booked in 2 treatments a sunburn package and a massage. I think firstly there was a language barrier, we had a few awkward moments where they walked in on my husband getting changed and made it very uncomfortable with regards to keeping my chest covered during the treatments - I'm not used to being exposed so much. The other thing was the constant leaving the room during the treatment, when I have had treatments where they need to let something sit for a couple of minutes usually the spa therapist will rub your head or feet etc but both therapist kept leaving the room - we felt like we were a burden to them and for the price we spent on the treatments we weren't the happiest. Other than that for a beautiful quiet place its a great choice.
title: Private Pool Villas Amazing

text:
Everything was impeccable - cleanliness, attentiveness and accommodation (one bedroom villa). The staff deserves extra praise - genuinely friendly, smiling and professional. As a solo traveler I got privacy when I needed it and yet the staff were always ready to talk to in case I needed company. 

I tried the spa treatments. Booked 90 mins deep tissue massage by Kadek. That was the best I've had in years. Ended up booking another session. Again as excellent as the first one. Also tried a facial and pedicure, total 120 mins. Excellent again. 

A free shuttle bus to the beach is available twice per day. The staff took me by car to the supermarket (free) whenever I required it. Also did couple of trips. The temple trip was arranged through the reception who booked me a taxi driver. It was okay, didn't go exactly as planned. The next trip was taken care by the Mahagiri staff (not outsourced) and that turned out to be exactly what I wanted. 

I had the best solo holiday I could wish for. The accommodation was exactly as described, no disappointment what-so-ever, the staff was the best ever and the spa treatments were excellent. 
Amazing value for money!!!
title: Amazing value for money!!!

text:
First and foremost, the staff… 10/10 for service at Mahagiri Dreamland, nothing was too much trouble, everyone was so friendly from Manager, food & beverage, housekeepers, gardeners and maintenance! special mention to ADE. I came to celebrate my birthday and on our last day 8 staff members came to my villa to sing happy birthday with a cake & flowers. such a beautiful gesture and a memorable way to finish our holiday, thank you.
We had a late night flight and were able to leave our luggage with reception while we went out for the day. When we returned they gave us access to the main pool, spa facilities(showers, gym if we wanted) and ordered a few last drinks at the bar. we were so grateful to be able to freshen up before our flight home. also FREE SHUTTLE TO AIRPORT!!! we had minimal rupiah left to spend and this service was a great help. 
Mahagiri is lovely and quiet, villa was beautiful & clean, bathroom was stunning, we loved the outdoor shower! about 15-20minute drive to the iconic cliff faces in Uluwatu. easy to get taxi's and they also organised a scooter for us! Great price, good value for money
title: a relaxing, memorable stay!

text:
Stayed in an one bed villa over my birthday weekend, the staff were incredibly helpful and lovely! The staff arranged for flowers and cake for my birthday which really made my stay extra special! There was nothing the staff could improve on- never met service like it. Especially to adu (bar tender).
The villa was incredibly clean- gorgeous big bath overlooking the swimming pool, rainforest outdoor shower next to pool and open plan living room that were gorgeous.
The restaurant food was incredible and would definitely recommend the cocktails! Reasonably priced and tastes great! Fabulous shared swimming pool next to bar also if fancy change of on personal pool. Also asked at bar where books were to be swapped (as stated on website) and were shown a variety of books to swap for poolside reading.
Great villa, service and holiday! Will be back for my honeymoon!
title: Beautiful Stay!

text:
If you are looking for a private villa as home base, then this place provides excellent value for money.

Pro:
1. Spacious area. Our 3 bedroom villa is 400sqm.
2. Reasonable in-house prices. We ordered lunch for 6 when we arrive, the total bill around Rp 400k. You can ask for a drinking water gallon for Rp 35 k a gallon, a gallon here is 19 liters, not the US 4 liter gallon.
3. Good shuttle service. 2 MPV picked us up when we arrive, more than enough for 6 adults and their luggage. On our last day, we leave our bags at the hotel to be transported later that day to the airport while we maximize our last day in Bali. 
4. Well & prompt service. I misplaced a valuable on my second day, report it to the front desk, and though it's me who misplaced my item, the villa took the precaution to lock our villa. Complaints about a bathroom fixture was promptly resolved
5. Relatively well equipped kitchen. We have fridge, microwave, water heater, clean utensils. We brought an infant so these equipment in clean condition matter for us.

Cons:
1. Our standard of cleanliness is very high, and there are very few places where it cannot be better met. Clean glasses are put face down directly touching the cupboard surface, there are some spots in the bottom of some glasses. Utensils, plates, bowls, and glasses wasn't rinse with drinkable water after it was washed. The team has to be reminded to wash their hands before they start working on clean linens. Do note however that we notice these things because the items are there in the villa, you never know how other places clean their cutlery or treat their linens
2. Location is a one hour drive from seminyak. Less problem because we plan our schedule to leave during the day and back in the afternoon.

So overall, we get a relatively affordable home base for 6 adults that is spacious, has its own private pool, sufficiently equipped, good service, that we can use before or after we start our day tour of Bali.
title: Excellent value for money

text: This hotel looks just like the photos, very clean and luxurious. It was very quiet and peaceful, we couldn't hear road traffic which was nice. It is a bit far to travel from places like Kuta, so if you're looking to do a lot of shopping etc in the main touristy areas, this place probably isn't for you. However as we were on our honeymoon, we spent a lot of time at the hotel, and if we needed to go somewhere close the hotel staff took us in the free shuttle. The staff were incredibly nice and got to know us throughout our stay, and also gave us recommendations which were very helpful. The only fault I have, would be the laundry service turned our whites a slightly brown colour, otherwise everything else was great.
title: Great place for a honeymoon

text:
one of the best places to stay at when you visit bali. You could be on honeymoon or a family trip. They have awesome villas.Quite away from hustle and bustle of the city.
The market is a 05 minutes walk from the place. 
The pool is neat and clean and well maintained.Food is priced at decent rates.How can i forget the staff.That is the best part about this villa. The staff are a true gem.For us the heroes were SILA and KANA from restaurant and in-room dinning and Nengah at the reception who helped us with check in and Check out formalities.
SILA and KANA will for sure make your stay a memorable one. They are the true assets of Mahgiri Vilas.
one more person i would like to mention.We were met by their manager Ayu. She is sweet and gave us a nice gift as well.She personally wished us and bid a personal farewell to us.Thank You Ayu.
We will definitely stay at the property on our next trip.Love you Guys.Thank you for making this a memorable trip for us.God Bless.
title: Truly Luxurious and Amazing Staff

text:
Me and my wife got away at the start of 2017 to celebrate and enjoy a honeymoon away from our normal lives in Melbourne.
When we arrived at the airport we had a driver from mahagiri waiting for us to take us back to the resort. It was late at night so we went straight there. on arrival he organised our bags to go to our villa and the receptionist organised a nice ice cold drink.
The next morning we got up and could properly suss things out. OMG WOW!!!! the villa was incredible. the room was nice and cold with the air con on and the pool just outside was super nice and private. the bed was big and comfy so had no problems having a good rest. 
Each morning we had breakfast in the restaurant where the guys always took care of us. all the food was of a high standard just as you would expect from a up market resort. We ate dinner here 3-4 times during our stay. again the food was great. the drinks were great and the bin tangs were cold! 
The service from Silo, Ardi, Kunna and buddy were way and beyond amazing. They knew our names and made us feel special. 
The recerption team were also very helpful! they organised taxis, cars, transfers as well as answered any questions we asked.
The resort is kept in amazing condition. the team that look after it do a amazing job. 

My favourite part about the resort is its location. Its not in Kuta, Its not in Seminyak. Its a little bit away from the hustle and bustle. Its about 15-20min taxi ride ($10-$15 Taxi) but its so nice and quiet. Super close to Jimberan Beach!!!! ( Amazing Beach and Seafood )

Overall we had a AWESOME experience with this report. For our first trip to Bali this was a Perfect choice for a lovely quiet get away.

Thank you so much Mahagiri. We loved every minute we stayed with you. Will return one day
title: AMAZING RESORT in a quiet area of Bali

text: Beautiful villa for honeymoon trip. Me and my husband are having beautiful experience during our stay with Mahagiri Dreamland. All just run perfectly with outstanding service from their staff. We will definitely back.
title: HEAVEN

text:
The best services at this villa that i got in my holiday
The staff were so friendly.
Especially staff in the restaurant .
The food on breakfast served very quick and so delicious
Thank you very much for everything 
See you next time bali...
title: Honeymoon

text: The staff will makes your holliday to be memorable. The villa was so clean, huge and well maintained. The service's so excellent. The foods are great. They will arrange your tour too. Definitely will stay again on my next holliday.
title: Superb

text:
The location is in a village with lots of Traditional Indonesian structures. It's near to a lot of attractions and hotel offers shuttle to happening places every hour.
The villas they provide are clean and well maintained. The pools were clean and the water quality was good. The staff there are very attentive towards the needs of the guest and friendly. The spa offered here is recommended as it's a reasonable price for the service they provide. The resturant offers tasty Indonesian meals. For a experience of uluwatu and Balinese village go no other than Mahagiri.
title: Beautiful Villas

text: The 3 bed private villa was outstanding, large, well maintained and completely what we wanted in a romantic break away. The staff were courteous and kind, always saying hello and ensuring we were happy. Room service and mini bar prices were very reasonable. The popular beaches and airport were just a short drive away. Please be advised you cannot walk to the nearest beach so a car or scooter hire is recommended.
title: Outstanding private villas!

Only stayed here briefly but we really enjoyed our stay.  The staff were so friendly and happy, they couldn't do enough for us.  The villas were kept extremely clean, and I was most impressed that in the evening when housekeeping arrived to spray the room and turn back the bed, they also had a security officer with them.  It was the little things that will leave a lasting impression with me, especially the service, the phone calls to make sure it was OK to bring breakfast as we had chosen to have in our room on our last day, to ask when it would be suitable to have our room cleaned, very helpful in assisting with taxi rides.  The young male staff were very friendly and great to chat with.
Also to have cable tv in the outdoor area was a bonus as we preferred to stay in at night.

This is really a gorgeous villa, and once you arrive, you won't want to leave. I didn't! There's acres of space, both inside and out. The pool is a proper swimming pool, which is not always the case with these types of villas. the furnishing are gorgeous. the free DVD service is a nice touch. A great experience if you don't mind too much about location.

The only critique is that the location is neither here not there. That won't be why you are staying at this villa. The food I had was not great, and the hidden tax and services charge (21%) on everything was a bit annoying.

But, a wonderful villa all the same.

text:
it's our first time in bali and we have chosen this villa as it is very nice from the photos. there are pros and cons for sure. i love their services, it's like a personalised service we got here!

pros;
i have met with mr. kerry from the front office department for my three days trip. he escorted me to the places where he recommended us to go like dreamland beach, jimbaran seafood and luwak coffee plantation. it is a relaxing trip for us therefore therefore we didn't really have any plan for our trip. mr. kerry tried his best to send us to the places on time. He is very friendly and helpful to us. He tried to get discount for us for the dolphin seeing but it was an unfortunate for us due to fully booked.
however for mr. kana from f&b department, he is friendly and helpful to us too! Wherever we go, he will always remember our names and politely asked us of our stay and foods we had.
a big thumbs up for this two gentlemen! :)

cons;
1. hair dryer is so weak that my hair has to be dried for one hour long.
2. shampoo that they provide has a very strong smell that we don't like it at all.
3. conditioner is not refilled when we checked-in and bath foam is not refilled after we used finish it.
4. safety box is broken and they did not check it before we checked in.
5. hot water will be cut in the middle i don't know why.

overall bali's water activities are expensive but we still managed to fill our time wisely on what we wanted. thank you for the team that have served us! highly recommended!
title: friendly staff.

text:
Mahagiri Villas Dreamland was a honeymoon dream come true. Me and my wife were picked up from the airport upon arrival, had first class treatment throughout our stay, made friends with the staff, and had a wonderful time.  It was sooooo nice to be able to watch TV and take a shower outdoors... and at 2 AM if you feel too hot you could jump in your private pool.  They were able to help out with renting a motorbike, which me and my wife loved using to explore Bali (its much more exciting than a car, but a little dangerous).  They also really try hard to reduce the amount of mosquitoes which I hate... so that was good. 

All in all, it was a great experience for a great price... If we ever go back to Bali we would definitely stay here.  And if the staff is reading, Kevin and Dounia say HI!!!
title: Awesome honeymoon

text: Amazing villas and the staff were the most welcoming and kind we experienced in Bali.  Great food and especially great breakfast. Additionally, the hotel offers a lot of great services and everyone is very helpful. Couldn't recommend more highly.
title: Best service in Bali

It's very heartwarming to see how much you and your family have enjoyed your time with us and it looks like you did almost everything we have to offer.
Once again thank you very much for the excellent review about Mahagiri Villas Dreamland.
Let us know if there is anything that we can do for your next stay with us here.

Best regard,

Gusti Bawana
General Manager
owner_response.title: Tanggapan Pemilik

text:
Last day of our holiday in Bali. we are still at Mahagiri villas dreamland. can't wait till home to review this place. Luxury, private with comfortable facilities and room amenities.
Private swimming pool for our family. so friendly staff and some time they do baby sitting for our kid while we having breakfast for free. and many more.
For sure we will come back again.
title: Private luxury villas

owner_response.text:
Dear Ms. Kacy,

Greetings from Bali ! 
I would like to thank you for taking the time to write such great review about your experience.

My team will be very happy to know how much you enjoyed your time here. I will surely pass it on to the team.

We could not wait to welcoming you back here soon.
Please email us at reservation@mahagirivillasdreamland.com for special offer & benefits as our return guest.

Best regard,

Gusti Bawana
General Manager
owner_response.title: Tanggapan Pemilik

text: Peaceful and tranquil with super helpful staff. All the team worked hard to ensure my stay was enjoyable. I had a 3 bedroom Villa (104) which was more than adequate for 5 adults, great pool, very private and clean. All three rooms had en-suite with nice bathrooms and an outside shower. A hairdryer, iron and a kitchenette is supplied in the villa, also a staff room if you are accompanied with a maid or driver. Airport pick is also provided. Room service is available at good prices happy hour on cocktails is daily/ Particular mention to Kana and Ade who looked after us very well. Thanks also for a lovely surprise birthday cake and flowers for my wife from the whole team in our villa. Also highly recommend the Spa, prices are sensible and service is superb. We have already made another reservation for December and New Year within a day of leaving Bali.
title: First but not last time in Bali

owner_response.text:
Dear Mr. Philip Burns,

Thank you so much for taking the time for this great review and for being our valuable customer. I am sure the team will be very happy to hear this news especially Kana and Ade.
I am so glad that you had a great time overall. The villa, the staffs & the services are excellent and we guarantee there are no other places for an experience like we have here.
We can't wait to meet you again in this December and celebrate the New Year with Mahagiri Villas Dreamland.
Please stay in touch with us by send email to reservation@mahagirivillasdreamland.com
Once again thank you very much for this excellent review.

Best regard,

Ayu Cahyani
Director of Sales
owner_response.title: Tanggapan Pemilik

text: Mahagiri Dreamland villas are a must, they are very large villas with large pools that you can actually swim in! I have stayed in a one bedroom and they are also very very spacious.  The Three bedroom villa, is a lounge/dining/kitchen with TV and the three bedrooms are completely separate with one large pool and covered day bed, outside  shower, separate toilet and even a maids quarter if needed. If you get up graded from a one bedder you may get the main bedroom in the 3 bedroom villa just for yourself like we did once. It is near a waterbom park (10mins) drive and also plenty of restaurants to choose from. The hotel also has a main pool, restaurant and bar which you can use if you choose not to stay in your villa for most of the time. I have stayed in quite a few villas in and around Bali but none came up to the standard of these villas in size, pool area and or course the service is first class they can't do enough to help you.
title: Amazing Villas

owner_response.text:
Dear Trudy,

It’s a blissful day at Mahagiri Villas & Spa  Dreamland.

Thank you for the fantastic comments about your great experience at Mahagiri Villas & Spa  Dreamland, it was a joy for our whole team to read!

Such positive reviews really do inspire our team to continue to deliver outstanding service and ensure you have a happy holiday!

We very much hope that we can welcome you back soon to Mahagiri Villas & Spa  Dreamland
owner_response.title: Tanggapan Pemilik

text: We stayed for 4 nights and loved every moment. Beautiful pool, outside shower, large pool and living quarters. We loved the outside living quarters since we dont get to live like that at home. The staff was wonderful in making sure we had everything that we needed,especially Suceilia ,sorry for spelling. We had two meals there and both were very good also. The only surprise for me was how dry the surrounding area is,dont expect tropical lush plantings.It truly was like having your own private small home!!
title: first rate experience, wonderful friendly staff, like having your own private home

text: I've stayed in a few holiday villas in and around S.E Asia and this place is most definitely at the top of my list.  The scenery is amazing, the staff are so friendly and professional, helpful but not overbearing like in other resorts in S.E Asia, and the area is picture perfect, you can spend hours just watching the ocean.  Also the food is great, a nice mix of local and Western and the beach is stunning.  This is truly paradise on earth and I can not wait to go back, I am already planning for my next vacation here.
title: A wonderful place

text:
The hotel was excellent. We normally stay in villas when staying anywhere for longer than 4 nights. But to experience a villa with hotel services was extraordinary for us. For a first time experience of Bali, we couldn't have asked for better.

The staff were consistent in being helpful not only in their everyday care of duty, but also giving us information about the Balinese people, traditions, culture, religions and food. We loved talking to them daily and have come away from our  holiday feeling enriched to have experienced this.

Made, Putra, Kana, Dedik and Susila we managed to see before we left. We were regretful to have missed Mudita and Budi. Hopefully, we will see them all when we return to the island.

Peter and Beverley
title: Annual leave

text: The villa is gorgeous. the personal area is very big. there is a villa with both indoor and outdoor shower. outside there is a seating area with a kitchen (below a roof of course) and then there is the pool which is simply amazing. the villas are really secluded so you are not disturbed by anyone. the people are very helpful. we had booked the honeymoon package which was including a lunch and a special honeymoon dinner (which included roses in the pool, musicians and a private waiter) and a massage. everything was great.
title: Paradise

text: The villas are exceptional and the staff friendly. However if you seek pampering your expectations are unlikely to be met. There is not much to do or see within walking distance. The spa is not good. However the food is good with a reasonable variety of Indonesian and western meals (although a little light on if you are vegetarian).
title: Great villas

text:
We stayed at Mahagiri Dreamland Villa during our wedding in July 2015. The General Assistant - Ayu, delivered top-notch customer services. Her staffs understand our needs and never fail to supply it in prompt. We visited Mahagiri during Feb 2014 to look at the villa and immediately knew that it would be a good stay for our families and friends.  

When we arrived, our families were really happy with the amazing set-up of our villas. The compound were always kept clean and it gave a very comfortable ambience. Our rooms had the most wonderful bed and pillow. The breakfast was good. We also had a buffet lunch during our wedding day, and our families and guests enjoyed it very much.

Overall, the stay at the villa was an unforgettable one. My husband and I were really glad that we have chosen this villa for our stay and we will definitely be back!
title: Excellent stay for Wedding celebration.

text: Very beautiful private villa with very spacious living area ... Master room and guest room with a nice pool. They had rose petals and lot of decorations as it was our honeymoon.. We enjoyed the 4 nights we spent there. Very romantic, quiet and calm.. And the staff are really nice and helpful.
title: Beautiful !!!

text:
The villa is very nice and comfortable and the service is very good all the people are friendly and respectful. 
The points of weakness: the water in the swimming pool was very cold that we couldn't enjoy our time but anyway thank you for everything
title: Honey moon in Bali

text:
Nice and tranquil location of Villas, but definitely need improvement on breakfast.. Well even the tranquil area, unfortunately the dogs and rooster were shouting each other in the middle at the night. I was staying for 6 days 5 nights here.. 
Free Rides to nearer groceries shop or restaurant or Jimbaran Beach / Dreamland Beach..
title: Good stay

text: Went to Bali for a friend's wedding and stayed in a three bedroom villa. The villa itself was lovely, and the service was good as you would expect. Location-wise you'll need transport to get anywhere else, so it's probably best for when you're just planning to stay in and laze all day.
title: Lovely Place to Relax In

text:
Came here as a couple after reading the reviews on trip advisor. We absolutely adored our stay... It was the staff that made it so fantastic.
The food is not great... But the rooms are really like your own little home away from home. They were absolutely beautiful! We hired a scooter through Mahagiri and had the best time visiting all the beaches. A great Mexican place just down the road called warung ohana and a 20min trip down to Jimbaren Bay for seafood.
We will absolutely be back. 
We were so sad to leave.
A special thank you to Susila & Made xxx
title: 5 star! Faultless!

text:
It is suitable for family holidays or couples on honeymoon. Convenient location, quiet, away from the crowds, excellent service and a friendly staff.

Close to the coast, Jimbaran beach, Dreamland, Uluwatu Temple and other tourist attractions.
title: Great Villa !

text: Lovely villa to stay at, never stayed at one with private pool. Breakfast service to the room for few $ and eat at the dinning table. Which is worth it. Staff friendly and helpful. They upgraded us and we didn't ask for it. They put us close to our friends which we didn't know about and was good to be close to them. It's bot 40mins away from the main areas , which only cost bot $15 taxi ride. The shower is out side, part of your room and feels like showering outside with nature. Big shower heads, rooms massive, safety box and free wifi in villa.  Also helped us out on check out day and took us to the airport at no cost because my other transfer company I booked, with didn't show up. the company was running late and we would had miss our flights. I tip the car driver for been grateful.   Keep up the good work and next time it's worth staying again here
title: Wedding

text:
Everything is nice, i love all the details of the villa. 

I did arrange a wedding dinner there, but the food really disappointed me, it they could improve that part, would be perfect!

and my wedding planner arranged a wedding cake to the villa, i think the villa didnt arrange and communicate well with the planner, and we spend some time when we arrived the villa!
title: Nice Villa!

photos.caption: Really big in terms of size, i love it!

text:
Accomodations are lovely, dining in our personal villa if we wished, refreshing in our private pool, showering out-of-doors in a glass enclosed garden setting. What  truly makes this facility so nice is the staff. Each was dedicated to making our stay the most important item on the agenda. Thank you Kana, Made, Putra, Harry, Keri for greeting us with smiles, trying to teach us Balinese, making sure each of our requests was answered quickly and as positively as possible. Every person on staff was polite and courteous.
The one weakness was the dining, particularly the western food.
title: Comfort and relaxation

text: For a romantic getaway - this place is perfect! If you want to do lots of shopping - this is not the place. The staff are amazingly friendly and helpful and the food is the best I have had in Bali.  Waking up each morning and looking out over the pool is absolute bliss! Definetly recommend for couples who want a break!
title: Mahagiri Villas Dreamland

text:
We arrived at the airport welcomed by the resort's very friendly driver. The place is not next to the beach, although not very far from the coast but all is worth by the staffs top notch service! Everyone was professional, effecient and very friendly. I guess this made my rating 5star! The Service! 
The place is amazing. We were lucky to be upgraded to the biggest villa with its own private pool, size did not really matter to us since we only occupied 2 villas as the lounge/kitchen and the masters bedroom. The small pool was just enough for a couple or a family who would like to have their privacy. It is very tranquil and private inside the villa's compound that gives you the feeling of a perfect sanctuary of relaxation. The food i must say is mediocre but knowing bali has loads of great restuarant to dine again it was not a big deal. The massage and spa were great but the ambiance could be better. The spa service was good having genuine and friendly staff.
Well recommended for a family or couple who would like to have complete privacy and a bit far away from the touristy places.
title: A perfect get-away for a relaxing holiday

text:
For the Bali trip, I spent 2 night in Intercontinental resort and two night in this villa.
The resort in IC is great and the experience in this Villa is another style of relaxation.

The location is not so good in general when you are talking about the famous tourist spot in Bali island, however, this villa hotel is very close to Dreamland and Jimbalan beach so you still could spend your time there.

Another advantage is the free shuttle provided from the hotel to the near spots, within the distance of 5km, I am sure the hotel is eager to provide the shuttle for you, but please don't forget the tips. 

The staffs are extremely polite and nice, I travel quite a lot of places and the hotels experience here is absolutely differentiated. It is not a chain hotel group so the management here is very dedicated to a "Close and heart-touching" style, so what you feel here is greatly different than the normal hotels or even when you compare to the 5stars hotels, I still prefer the service here.

The hotel is not brand new which has been operated for 3-4years but the maintenance is quite ok and the house keeping also did a good job for it.
The villa is great even it is my first time in Bali, there is nothing to complain in term of the space and cleanliness of the water.  The villa area is very big so you can either take a rest outside or inside the room. Moreover,during the night, with the absolute clear sky, you can see lot of stars in the villa which is quite romantic.

For the room, it is quite good but my main focus will be the villa instead of the room. One more thing, the hotel does provide a large fridge, microwave cooking device, so you can make your stay more comfortable. And the food, ordered from the hotel restaurant is up to standard with a fair pricing tag.

The two night stay here was very very good and we totally forgot the outside world without going to other tourist spots in Bali. It's a perfect place for honeymoon so don't bother to go around.
The convenience store is a few minutes walk, and for the dinner, we went to a Thai restaurants two times and it was great too.

Another thing is breakfast, there are 10 choices so you wont get hungry and they provide coffee, tea and juice. Quite good. Recommend for breakfast in the villa but there's $3 dollar service charge. :) 
I would greatly recommend visitors here to relax but not rushing for spots.
It's amazing, believe me.
title: Another Dream vacation with unbelivable Villa

text:
I and my wife stay at this villa for 4 days
From 26 feb till 1 march ..All the staffs were very nice

Special thanks to Mr Kerina hotel front desk staff ,Mr Susila kitchen staff and their chef for preparing our delicious  meal. 

Special tks for the staff who deco the room in my wedding annivasary on 27 feb.

We also tried their spa ,very friendly therapist .

The villa was very awsome very cleaned and well managed. 

A Big thank you to all the staff..will come soon..
title: Wonderful expirence

text: I think it has been said  before but the staff are so good they deserve another mention.  This place is great for just laying back and  chilling out. a very quiet part of bali . For how long i dont know. Enjoy it while you can. The villas have every thing you need so all you have to do is lay back and enjoy . I would recommend this place to couples for a romantic break. Or to people who want a break from the stresses of work you can just lock yourself away from the world here.  Oh and the staff.
title: A nice spot to relax

text:
so we were looking for a villa with private pool hotel to stay at for a few days 
Mahagiri was our choice based on reviews and price along with location
if you are into relaxation then this is your spot . as their location is quiete as it's away from the center . also near several touristic areas
they have thr best staff ever. exceptionally friendly. the best room service 
they provided a crip. baby meals . They also provide free shuttles to several areas.
the villa design is just fantastic . extremely private and beautiful.
amazing Spa
honestly I couldn't ask for more.we felt we were in a dream

the only thing they need to control are the geckos. as the villas dining and living room doors are not cieled properly. so geckos go inside
title: The best getaway ever!

text: We chose to stay at Mahagiri Villas Dreamland based on on-line reviews. A very affordable pool villa option in comparison to many of the other pool villa resorts that are closer to the beach. The location was fine for us, close scooter proximity to all areas of interest for us - Finn's Beach Club, Uluwatu Temple and Bingin/Padang Padang areas. Staff were good, especially Made who was just delightful - lovely and genuine and super helpful. The staff also arranged scooters for us, which helped us to explore the area. Room itself had all the amenities needed, great bed, and the outdoor lounge/dining room was lovely. Pool was a great size but needed a good clean, lots of floaties. While we enjoyed our time at Mahagiri, comparing it to other villa resorts we have stayed at, it lacked a homey feel...we couldn't really put our finger on it, but perhaps because you enter and exit without going through reception? And just some things like charging extra for brekky in the villa or changes to the menu. Don't get me wrong, it was great, but have had more personalised experiences when visiting other similar villa style accommodations in Bali.
title: Great value for money pool villas in Uluwatu

text: My partner and I had a fantastic stay at mahagiri. Great room and even better service. The staff were lovely and friebdly and always went out of there way to make sure we had a good time. We will be back.
title: Fantastic!!!

text:
Well,this is our first time coming to Bali,so I just choose a random villa to stay.Lucky me,I choosed right!

I try their honeymoon package,which are very fantastic..from the moment we enter our villa till we checked out,everything just in perfect..Breaksfast in villa?its hard to find in my country,Malaysia..

The candlelight  dinner is something that I wont forget..They decorate our bathub,our pool villa,and also live music are there to entertain our dinner..Private chef on call?what could I ask for more..

Location is peacefully as its far from the centre.

I remember two of their staff which give a excellent service on our stay..Bang Kana and Bang Wahyu..

Jusy try,and experience itself

5 star
title: Honeymoon getaway

text:
My husband and I stayed 6 nights at the Mahagiri in November for our honeymoon.  We have been to bali before but normally stay in bigger resorts.

Staying at the Mahagiri was definitely a nice change! The villas were beautiful, spacious and  very private. The staff were amazing, they really made our trip.  Especially Made he was always making us laugh. The room service was great excellent food! Breakfast not as great as lunch and dinner though. 

The only down side to the hotel was that roosters and chickens kept us awake they would start at 3am and keep going all day along with dogs howling.  Was hard to have a sleep in. However the manager assured us he would get on top of it for future guests.  Also mahagiri is a fair way out of town so if you are after something quiet and private this is for you.
title: Magical honeymoon

text:
Words can't even explain how great our experience was at Mahagiri! We traveled 26 hours from Toronto, Canada to Bali for our honeymoon and our first stop was Mahagiri.  

From the time Gian picked us up at the airport to the time we were dropped off at our next destination, I would not have changed a thing. Every staff member was great and more than hospitable to us, more specifically our friends Kana, Made and Budi who treated us like family! 

The service, room and facility were perfect for my wife and I during our first stop ever in Asia! I have traveled a fair share throughout the world and I would have to say that this was my best experience to date. Nothing was too much to ask and any request was greeted with a smile. Small things go very far and they are doing all the right things to ensure guests feel more than welcome. 

Just an example... We wanted to see Uluwatu Temple before we left for Seminyak but we ran out of time... although it was the opposite direction, we were driving there on the way and also given a full tour! 

Thank you Mahagiri for a perfect start yo our honeymoon!
title: Absolutely incredible from start to end!

text:
Chosen specifically to meet special diet requirements for our daughter with food allergies we met and loved every staff member of this beautiful property.  From the initial courtesy email from the manager to our welcome drinks (FYI: the best)on arrival.    Susila and Made made our meal times very special.    The surprise reception of staff and birthday cake for our son Henry while we were staying was so special - great style and great fun!!

Our third property on our first ever visit into Bali... absolutely brilliant.  

Thank you for creating wonderful memories for our family and making a stamp on our hearts.  We are a family well travelled (from B&B's to Castles and everything in between) but no-where have we actually stepped into a place which has had us as a family appreciate or enjoy the hospitality with genuinely caring people more so.
title: "Premium Comfort with Top Class Staff"

text:
My two friends and I booked at Mahagiri Villa what can i say great staff/ great service and most of all we love love our own villa especially the size of the pool and the lounge room area we felt like a celebrity.. I miss it soo much and Keirry was so helpful to us and meeting our expectation ..  I highly recommend for a big family or even group of friends to stay at Mahagiri Villa!!

From all of us Girls!!

Thank you Mahagiri Villa!!

Cheryl xx
title: Best villa experience

text: Second time staying at mahagiri!! beautiful villas!! Perfect for a quiet getaway! 3 bedroom villas are perfect for family's, staff are lovely and helpful, 5 minute drive to the beautiful dreamland beach .Will definitely recommend and will be returning again!
title: We love mahagiri!

text: My husband & I recently spent ten days in the a one bedroom villa. The villa itself was absolutely beautiful and had everything you need. The food was great and was quite cheap averaged about $7.50. The staff went way beyond our expectations. My husband mentioned it was my birthday and that afternoon we came out to ten staff singing me happy birthday with a cake and flowers. We loved our stay and would love to stay again. It is quite secluded but has mini marts etc just around the corner. Thankyou :)
title: Amazing Stay
partner_attribution: Ulasan dikumpulkan dalam kemitraan dengan hotel ini

text:
We spent seven days at the Mahagiri Villas and Spa and loved every minute of our time there in the luxurious Villa.  It was so nice to be greeted everyday by smiling, happy, faces of all staff, from the gardener upwards.  George the owner also spent time with us and made us feel welcome.  It is a very quiet location, with small restaurants and a supermarket close by.  The hotel supplied a driver when I wanted to go to the ATM.  They also have a shuttle bus to beautiful beaches where you can have dinner on the beach. We couldn't have asked for a better stay.
On my birthday all the staff came and greeted me and brought a beautiful cake, flowers and a great card.  It was so delightful and welcoming.  Staff couldn't be more helpful. What happy dispositions they all have.
It was about 25 minutes by taxi from the airport $15 Australian
title: Outstanding venue and staff that couldn't be better

text:
We have just spent 3 days at Magahiri Villas and we did not want to leave!

My husband and I were travelling on our honeymoon and upon check in were immediately upgraded to the 3 bedroom villa. WOW this villa is stunning! Beautiful pool, sunbeds, day bed, outdoor shower. Way beyond our expectations, the internet photos do not do this place justice, even more beautiful in real life! So clean and fresh, spacious and quiet. The grounds from when you drive in to inside your villa are absolutely immaculate. We enjoyed a couples massage in their spa which was very reasonably priced and they even called in an extra girl for the hour so we could be massaged together.

The guys that work there could not do enough to make our stay amazing. Nothing was ever too much trouble for them. Free shuttle to Dreamland Beach and Jimbaran Bay was a great service.

The food was outstanding, in fact some of the best food we had in Bali.  You have to pre order your breakfast the day before which we didn't mind, sat up in the restaurant every morning and had brekky served within 5 mins of getting there, freshly squeezed juice and good coffee.

Have to mention Susila (Sila) as being absolutely outstanding in his work. Truly friendly guy, always made sure we were happy and nice to have a good laugh with. Thanks Sila for making our stay so great :)

We can not wait to return to Magahiri Villas on our next trip to Bali.
title: AMAZING!!

text: Special thanks to Ade, Canne, Silas and Doyok. You guys made us feel so welcome. A great place to stay if you go with a few friends and have no desire to go anywhere. The villa is awesome! Oh yeah if chooks awaken you, be prepared for sleepless nights.
title: Location not good if you like to walk anywhere, but staff and villas are second to none.

text: We stayed here for 4 nights in July after 4 nights in Seminyak. The staff were very helpful - if only all customer service experiances were like this we wouldnt need a trip advisor! We were upgraded to a 3 bedroom villa on arrival and it was very clean spacious and luxurious. I mhave no complaints about this place and would recommend to anyone.
title: Staff couldnt be more helpfull!

text:
The design of the reception and the restaurant is quite unique and beautiful.
All their staff are very friendly and helpful.
I love their villas as they only have 7 units in total, so it is not crowded and noisy, we can enjoy more our personal time and high privacy is provided.
title: Excellent stay and hospitality

text:
We stayed in a 3-bedroom villa for 3 days/2 nights in late June. We arrived late, as our boat from Gili Trawangan was delayed, but the staff went out of their way to answer our million questions, make sure we could get a bite to eat and show us around our villa before settling in for the evening. We had just spent 4 days in Gili T in a beautiful villa, so we prepared ourselves to have something of the same quality or less, but upon walking into our villa, we realized we definitely had an upgrade. Because of the comfort and luxury of our villa, we scrapped our plans to sightsee and stayed in our villa. 

The staff truly went out of their way to make sure our stay was nothing short of exceptional. Room service was always delivered in a timely manner and everything we tried on the menu was delicious. We even requested an order of 20 Bintangs to enjoy poolside, and they came with the beers and an ice bucket so we could enjoy it outside. My friends and I kept saying what really made the Mahagiri Villas stand out was the outstanding, friendly and warm staff--they really made us feel at home and no request was too much.
title: dreaming in dreamland.

text: We stayed here for 2 nights in early June.  Uluwatu generally has high end (expensive) hotels or the cheap 3 star or less stays, so it was lovely to find this villa hideaway which offers premium villas at a reasonable price.  There are just 15 villas here all equipped with the modern features from home and a large plunge pool. If you are after a quiet spot to relax, and still want to be close to Uluwatu's coast line (10-15 mins drive by cab) then this is the best spot to stay.  The staff here at the villas were by far the friendliest eager to please engaging service staff we experienced in Bali. Highly recommend!!
title: Personable Service Found

text:
We stayed in the Mahagiri for 2 weeks for our honeymoon in may 2014.

when we first opened the door to our villa we were blown away by how beautiful and amazing it was, the 1 bed villa outdoor area is massive and the bedroom was just as grand with its 4 poster bed and changing area.

We opted for room service breakfast most mornings and created our own breakfast which were not on the menu, they were on time every morning and the food was perfect.

We also had the romantic dinner in our villa which is a truly amazing experience, where you have a private chef, waiter, and 2 local musicians the food was the best/tastiest we had all honeymoon and we were in bali for 1 month so that is a massive compliment.

My wife got bit by a monkey at monkey forest and when we arrived back to the villa they asked how our day was, we explained and one of the members of staff personally drove us to the nearest hospital 25 min away, waiting while she had injections and then drove us back, he did not charge for this and said as we are one of the hotels guest we are their responsibility, the next day he phoned us up in our villa to see how she was feeling, The level of care the staff show to their guests is by far the best we have ever had.

The location of the villa is a little bit out the way from anything apart from local houses and small shops, but this was really not a issue for us as within 20 min you can get to some of the most beautiful beaches / temples / restaurants we have seen and the price of a taxi is around £2-3 GBP so real cheap.

We found the food at the villa really good and pretty cheap for a hotel, but if you did want to eat out  for cheaper there is a real nice local restaurant about 3 min walk from the villa where you can get a big meal for just over £1 GBP or there is a sandwich bar opposite this restaurant which sell the best sandwiches we had in Bali

The Staff were so friendly and we enjoyed sitting at the bar getting to know them. We have made some lovely friends and want to thank Sila, Kana and Budi for making our honeymoon perfect!

The rooms were extremely tidy everyday and housekeeping were brilliant and made every effort to make sure the room was up to standard 

We met the owner of Mahagiri while we were there and he arranged for us to get upgraded to the 3 bed villa for our last few days which was a lovely touch, the 3 bed villa's are massive and have a nice outside bed which the 1 bed does not have, I personally preferred the 1 bed villa as the lounge area is outside and find it makes the area more sociable,  But the main bonus with the 3 bed having a larger area is that it gets the sun for longer in the garden

We got a couples massage which was so relaxing and highly rated i just wish we had more

This Villa is very highly rated by us and i hope one day we will go back there
title: Best place we have ever stayed

text: We spent 4 nights in a 3 bedroom villa with our own private pool. Rooms were excellent with all the extras you could ask for, every room had its own ensuite with bath and secluded outdoor shower. The Restaurant is open from morning until late and the menu and their meals are fantastic. If you are having a lazy day and require room service, they are more than happy to deliver your meals to your villa. They have a shuttle service which will take you to 2 of the best beaches I have seen in Bali, when you have finished, the will send the vehicle to collect you and return you to your villa free of charge. Located at the end of the road is a Mini Mart (7 Eleven) which is convenient if you wish to purchase different things. We hired a motor scooter through them for 650,000RP a day which is about $6.50AUD. The staff are all fantastic, very very friendly and are more than happy to assist you for whatever you require. We will be retuning here again without doubt, same time next year.
title: Absolutely Stunning with Excellent Staff

text:
So, me and my husband were celebrating our anniversary and planned a Bali trip. We ended the trip in Uluwatu and chose this property. 
I couldn’t find many reviews for this place and was hesitant to book it. But the photos looked great so we booked it up. 

I’ve listed my feedback below:

1) this is an old property. The maintenance hasn’t been done. The upholstery is peeling. The fittings are old, the layout is bad. 

2) after using the pool, I’ve developed a skin allergy. And mind it, I was in Bali for a while and stayed in other properties but never felt that the pool wasn’t clean. 

3) the food is bad. I ended up ordering via apps to eat. 

4) the location is ok, but that’s not reason enough to book this

Overall, try and avoid this property
title: Old villas, no maintenance. Don’t stay here

text:
Pleasant clean villa with a lovely garden and pool. Good temperature in pool and sunshine. Nice traditional day bed ‘bale’ and day lounges. Could do with an umbrella. Adequate living room with kitchen, large table, large lounge and good tv. Nice outdoor shower and enclosed bathroom with large window. Nice bed, good aircon. 
The restaurant and kitchen staff not up an running yet after Covid. There was a limited menu from a local restaurant  which is delivered, it was nice but I missed having staff come and cook in your kitchen or ordering cocktails etc. overall a nice safe pleasant place that needs a little maintenance soon such as stiff bifold doors, new shower head and bedroom tv reception.
title: Pleasant stay lovely pool

text:
We rented a 3 bedroom villa at Mahagiri Dreamland Villas for a couple of weeks.  The size of the villa is remarkable.  1 very large common area for seating, dining and kitchen.  1 very large bedroom with a walk-in closet and private bathroom and shower.  2 rather large bedrooms each with private bathroom and shower.  All of these rooms surround an outdoor private pool with lounge chairs and palm trees.  The pool area is truly private, surrounded by 10 foot walls, and is quite suitable for a nice refreshing dip whenever the mood strikes you.  The sitting, dining and kitchen area has a large sectional sofa and a dining table for 8.   The master bedroom has a 4 poster.  All beds are king size and very comfortable with good linens.  All the bathrooms have a very large tub and traditional outdoor shower, again very private.  Towels and amenities are decent.  All rooms have a reasonably quiet air conditioning unit.  But I'll share more on that later.

The villa common areas include a public pool, restaurant, bar, spa and gym.  The restaurant is adequate but better food can be found not far from the villa.  The spa room is mostly used for massage, where prices are very reasonable: $28 USD for 90 minutes, and the treatment was professional.  Cheaper spa prices can be found elsewhere but then you have to get there and back.  We didn't use the gym so can't say anything about it.

All things considered, we felt this villa was an excellent value and would easily return.  The reason for 4 stars rather than 5 is because there were some maintenance issues with 3 of the 4 AC units.  I think these are older AC units and have trouble holding their charge.  But the service to come charge them up was prompt.  We only spent one night without AC in one of the bedrooms.  And that was only because we didn't notice it not working until late at night and by then the maintenance people had gone home for the day.

The staff is very attentive and interested in serving you as well as possible.  At every turn we were asked how things were, were we enjoying ourselves, was they anything we needed, etc.  Very friendly people who keep the place running smoothly.

The villa location is excellent.  Only 15 minutes drive to many beaches and restaurants.  Be sure to hire a car and driver.  You probably do not want to drive in Bali.  Cars with drivers are cheap by comparison.  Ours was only $35 per day for 10 hours, arranged through a local tour company.

Finally, I want to say something about the area restaurants.  You can eat really, really cheaply in Bali.  Indonesian specialties are plentiful and delicious.  But spend a tiny bit more for typical western fare and you will be surprised at the high quality and low price.  We tried two italian restaurants, not more than 15 minutes from the villa, and each was outstanding.  And I don't mean sort of.  They were both top notch, obviously with kitchens that knew what they were doing.  And only about $15 USD per person.  Ridiculous!

Anyway, if you're looking for a well located, spacious villa in Dreamland you can't go wrong with Mahagiri Dreamland.
title: Spacious 3 Bdr Villa

text: The Mahagiri villas are extremely beautiful. The size of each villa is big and comfortable. The staff is so welcoming and helpful towards accommodating your stay. We did feel the grounds were a bit old fashioned, but quickly got over it and were really happy with our stay. It’s so awesome having your own pool and chairs to lay at by the pool. Breakfast every morning was delicious and kept us full til late lunch! We rented a motorbike, as it’s a 5 minute drive to dreamland beach so it was quick to get there. We even got a free ride to the airport after our stay, score! Staff comes by every night to close your curtains and undo your bed to sleep in and if anything is needed the staff is there to help. Since the place is a bit old, the WiFi is slow and weak. If they fix this and get new routers throughout the villas, this place would be even better!
title: Sweet sweet honeymoon

text:
After spending a week in the hustle and bustle of Seminyak, we wanted to end our Bali trip unwinding and relaxing, and Mahagiri provided the perfect place to do it!

Beautiful, peaceful villas mixed with friendly and accomadating staff made for the perfect end to our first time in Bali.

Thanks so much for everything Mahagiri staff. We will definitely be back!
title: Impressed!

text: Me and my partner stayed here for 3 nights at the end of our trip. The villa we got was huge, made for families but we enjoyed the extra space. Breakfast was a treat to have served directly in the dining area at your requested time. It was a short walk to the shop to stock up on booze and lounge around the pool all day. The staff are very friendly and cater to requests (mine was candles in my partners omelette on his birthday haha) I would stay again.
title: Wonderful place and relaxing

text:
Stayed for four nights.
Staff are incredible, attentive and super friendly. Unfortunately the owners are letting them down as place desperately needs alot of maintenance. 
Breakfast very average. Coffee bad.
No other meals done in-house
title: Tiered

text: We staid 2 nights at the beginning of our holiday in Bali. We wanted to live the experience to have a villa with private pool just for us and this was a pro. The villa is big, well maintained, clean, but the furniture is a bit old. To have a open air shower, a big hot tube and a private pool was the plus point. The breakfast is good but not so many choices for vegans. The villa is quite far for the beaches, you need a car to discover the surroundings and we have two members of staff drivers with car for the decent price of Rp 400,000 for whole day and visited some beaches and the Temple. We had our meals out of the villa, but the prices quite big in the restaurants. The staff is helpful and friendly.  They pick us free from the airport. Our stay overall was allright, with the only regret that the accommodation was little far from the beaches.
title: Nice experience

text: Staff were nice, location was ok considering ulwatu area. But the place is surrounded by roosters and chickens and they are howling from 430am right through until lunch time! Earplugs don’t work, so loud. 4 sleepless nights not worth the money
title: Dreamland? Farmland

text:
Just had an amazing stay at Mahagiri!
Great staff who were always ready to help with everything including tours and recommendations on what to se and do near the villas.
The food was good - loved the breakfast in the villa which was always on time.
I will definately come back if I ever get the chance!
title: Fantastic

text: Do yourself a favour and book elsewhere! The staff are friendly but at times we felt very awkward and unwelcome. We booked this villa based on the reviews and were extremely disappointed to find that multiple appliances didn't work. The general feel of the villas are outdated.
title: Extremely disappointing...

text: Myself and my partner spent 7 nights here. In our first villa, numerous appliances such as the shower and bath did not work properly, as well as lights and the safety box. There was even a hole in the bedroom roof, which was covered in spider webs. Upon complaining, the staff were very helpful and upgraded us to a nicer villa with fewer problems. However, the second villa was not without its own issues. The shower was also broken in this villa, and multiple lights were still not functioning. The staff were always polite and helpful, however we felt the Villa's main downfall was a lack of attention to detail. Considering the amount of money we had paid, we had very high expectations, and should not have had to deal with so many broken appliances. Sadly, we will not be returning here, as we feel we could pay less for a more pleasant experience elsewhere. I am not normally one to write a negative review, however I would hate for another couple to experience the same disappointment we did. Better to seek accommodation elsewhere.
title: Fairly Disappointed

text: One of the most beautiful place ever visited, villas are more than wonderful, team so sympathic, breakfast and service awesome..! Really if you want to enjoy your Bali experience .... go to villa mahagiri...!!!
title: Excellent !!!! Super Nice !!! Excellent team!

text:
Finished off our Bali vacation with 4 nights at Mahagiri Villas. Staff were amazing, polite, timely and made every effort to meet all our requests no matter how small. Accommodation will be familiar to those who like to access the pool villa style in Bali - private and spacious.
Sadly the owners have let the staff down with somethings looking a little tired and in need of some TLC. The bed is a lovely style and size with the mosquito netting available and easy to access. The wifi while free is sporadic dropping out regularly and very weak as you move around the compound. This villa is a little isolated so be prepared for the need to access transport. The near by Dreamland Beach is well worth a visit and is safe and relaxing for a day out.
title: Relax and be spoilt

text:
Lovely secluded Villas ( very small only 7 villas ) beautifully appointed and very clean 
Our private pool was huge 
The shuttle bus service was excellent indeed, friendly safe driver 
Dreamland beach was very nice too
All the staff are so lovely ( wish you all well )
Thank you for a fabulous stay
Good for Honeymooners and golfers, those who want to get away from hustle
title: Happy Bali Days in Lovely Villa

text: It is was our first time at Bali and the first hotel we visited. Certainly a very good choice!! We have been immediately upgraded to a bigger villa with private pool and the place is so beautiful and clean. Just perfect to relax. They have a shuttle service to the beaches and do their utmost to ensure a beautiful stay. We want to thank especially Ade and Dewa for their great hospitality. It was indeed a nice time we spend here and I will definitely recommend to stay here!
title: Very nice hotel - great stay!

text:
Excellet service, we enjoyed stay at this villa.
We got free shuttle to dreamland beach and Jimbaran beach.
They tell to us about show at Uluwatu Temple, it was amazing.
Staff is amazing, good service and very kind. 
Thank your so much for everything.
title: ❤️

text:
my phone broke because of the dodgy wall charger they leave you! thank you very much for braking my iphone 6 and doing absolutely nothing at all about it except say uhhhhhhhhhhhhhh! TERRIBLE!
still in shock that i could pay that much for a holiday and them not care at all that my phone broke because of them!!!!!!! also wouldn't suggest getting a massage their as they dont spray mosquito spray in the massage area and me and my boyfriend came out of the massage with mosquito bites all over our body! very uncomfortable!
title: wouldnt trust the wall chargers if i was you!

the villa it self is so luxury with fully equipped as a five star accommodation. for sure will stay here again on our next holiday in Bali

The bedrooms are big and so is the bathrooms with external shower in nature. I did love the swimming pool and the small garden. The breakfast is served in the villa cafe and villa too with extra charge. Shuttle sevice is provided to dreamland beach. text:
Stayed here for three nights and it was absolutely lovely! After long days of sightseeing and being on the go it was nice to return back to our private (very spacious) villa for the evening to relax and get a good nights rest. The private pool was clean and a major perk! They offered turn down service every evening complete with cookies! 
The staff here is kind, helpful and accomodating! They were very patient and generous to us. They also offer a great selection of DVDs to borrow if you're looking for something to watch in the evening. The place is a little ways away from everything so we found it helpful to take the short walk from the hotel up to the main road to catch a Blue Bird (for the best value). I would stay here again for sure and highly reccomend if you want a hotel for a great value and friendly staff - also off the path from the hustle and bustle! This would be a great place to come if you just plan to relax and stay in, it has everything you need.
title: Fantastic!

owner_response.title: Tanggapan Pemilik

text:
We were upgraded to a 3 bedroom villa upon arrival. The other two bedrooms were locked but we had a much bigger common area and the pool was huge. Our villa was very spacious and well-appointed. Everything was in working condition. There were no bugs either. I never got a single mosquito bite the whole time. I was pleasantly surprised. 

The thing I liked the most was their food. Mahagiri had about 10 options for breakfast. In most villas I've stayed at you get about 3-4 set menu breakfast options. If you stay at one place for more than a few days, you can get quite tired of having the same things everyday. We got room service one day and it was quite delicious as well. 

The service was overall good. The man at the front desk that checked us in was quite unfriendly and lacked warmth. I asked him some questions and he was reluctant to answer. I could tell when it was him on the phone when he would answer the call because he always sounded indifferent. Other than that the staff we encountered were always all smiles and wanted to make sure our stay was comfortable. 

The location of the hotel is not ideal. It's not close to anything. You needed a car to get anywhere. When the front desk calls you a taxi,they don't call the bluebird company which is the most honest and reliable taxi company in Bali and the drivers they called always ripped us off. I know exactly how much each ride was supposed to cost but they charged us 5 times that amount easily every time. However the hotel is less than a 10 minute car ride away from some great places like Finn's beach club. You're also not too far from Uluwatu. They also have DVDs at the front desk you can borrow if you get bored. 

There was one incident when I pulled a tea pot out of the cupboard, there was mouldy tea leaves inside. It smelled really bad as well. I know they used tea bags for the breakfast, and the tea inside was loose leaf, so I think it's been in there since the last guest made their own tea and the house keepers thought it was empty and put it back in the cupboard. Pretty gross and definitely not something I want to deal with on vacation. 

Overall I thought the stay was quite decent. There's definitely room for improvement. I don't think I will return again, mostly because of the location. However since the price is quite reasonable, I would recommend it if the location is not an issue for you.
title: Good villas at a very reasonable price
