text:
Check in was great, room was nice as seen in real life photos but when we viewed the room 105, we were upset that we found leftover snacks such as oreos & chips that were eaten and left in the kitchen by the previous guests. Also amenities seemed 'used' & opened before,  they were packed in a manner which looked rather messy.

Other than these 2, me and my boyfriend love their choices of breakfast menu and their warm hospitality. Unlike hotels, this villa is quiet thus staff do not really start a convo with you, i guess they believe guests wants extra space alone. Nonetheless, every staff will smile genuinely to you and would attend to you patiently if you call for their assistance. 

Also, the location of the villa is rather far from the shopping area such as beachwalk mall. Bluebird taxi on metre would cost around sgd$13.
title: Worth a visit

text:
Loved staying in Mahagiri Dreamland. Special thanks to all members of the staff. Pepito market is not far away by car to serve westerners needs if you are a bit tired of going oriental ))
The one and only minus of the place is food - starting from breakfast finishing with their onsite restaurant it is more then mediocre.
title: very nicely designed and serviced villas' resort

text:
We stayed at Mahagiri for 11 days in June 2014 and those days turned to be perfect holidays for us !

The main virtues of Mahagiri resort are luxury facilities and its outstanding Staff.

We were located in one bedroom villa (no 105). It was really beautiful and spacious. When we entered it first time, it looked to us even better than on the impressing pictures seen before. Large private pool and living room open to the private yard were very impressive and arranged with good taste. The greenery next to the pool (huge leafs) added some tropical touch. The bedroom was also spacious and equipped with comfortable king size bed. We liked a lot the shower in the open air next to the pool with easy access from the bedroom and bathroom. The kitchen is fully equipped which allows cooking. Why would you do that though considering that the food at the resort is of very good taste and quality and rather inexpensive... For those who would like to check other options there is a nice little "warung" just some 3-5 minutes of lazy walk away from the hotel.
All in all facilities Mahagiri offers are luxurious and well maintained (housekeeping and room service are of primary quality)

The other factor that defines the highest quality of this resort is its Staff. We have never met at any other resort people who would be to that extent helpful, forthcoming, respectful and yet able to create so nice relaxed and friendly atmosphere. These are not just kind words , but I really mean it. People who we started to know as hotel staff have soon become to us far more than that. We would like to thank Keriana, Kana, Adi, Susila, Sudiana and all their colleagues whose names I have just missed for their involvement and all the little and big efforts they made to make our stay at Mahagiri so pleasant. 

The resort is located in a bit remote neighborhood, but it does not have to be considered negative. It is perfect for romantic stay, it is within walking distance to a few shops (including grocery and the “warung” mentioned before). Mahagiri also offers free of charge transportation to one of the best beaches in Bali – Dreamland Beach. It is just ~10 minutes away by car and  offers nice sand, big waves and limited crowds. It is a lot of fun to play in the waves there, but remain cautious as those waves can be dangerous. The reception at Mahagiri (especially Keriana) is able to arrange any tour you would like to have. It is also worthwhile to listen to their advice in those matters. 

I also share the thoughts of rickystubbs expressed in his comment below. I have very similar perception of various details he described in his review and I have also experienced similar beautiful moments at Mahagiri, such as ‘romantic dinner’, spa, talks to the staff etc 

Overall Mahagiri gave me one of my best vacations and I would be happy to return there some day and would definitely recommend it to other couples and families.
title: Best holidays

text:
The Goods 

1. Got upgraded to a 3 room villa. Although they locked 2 rooms, we were still very impressed with the huge living area and bedroom. And of course the huge pool and yard.

2. Staff were all very helpful and courteous.

3. Restaurant food was cheap by villa standards. For the local dishes, average spending is around SGD $10 per head.

4. Breakfast variety is good. It's not buffet style, you order from the menu but you get a lot of choices.

The Bads

1. The restaurant was slow in preparing food. Breakfast can take up to 40 mins upon ordering. The trick is to get the breakfast order form from them and order in advance the previous night.

2. The villa is showing signs of wear and tear. Maintenance could be improved.

3. For some reason, there were a lot of roosters around the villa and they started crowing at 3am in the morning.

4. English proficiency can be improved. I know the staff are trying their best. I appreciate it. But communication still broke down. For eg. I didn't know my kid had free kids menu although I asked about it. Somewhere along the we got lost in translation.
title: 50/50 Experience

text: Coming to Bali for the second time and having already experienced villas previously I found the mahagiri villas to be good! There were a few things I wasn't too pleased about which resulted in our experience not being great..! the outdoor shower heads need replacing as they weren't in decent working order, the cleaners found it necessary to turn off all the a/cons when cleaning the villa rooms which makes for a hot night after being out all day in the incredible heat, the noise from surrounding roosters and dogs are loud enough to keep even the heaviest if sleepers from getting rest. And breakfast was quite limited. Other than this We found the staff to be incredibly helpful (although a few of them don't speak any English) kana in particular offered incredible service and worked tirelessly to please us daily. If shopping is what your after then this isn't the place for you. It's pretty secluded but does have free shuttles to very nice beaches! There is a supermarket near by which we just hired a scooter for easy accessibility..  Overall we had a good relaxing experience and will look at returning at some stage soon.
title: A good relaxing experience!

text: Based on blossoming reviews on TA and Booking.com our group of 10 people stayed 4 nights in 3bedroom and 1bedroom villa. There are only 7 villas in the resort and you will hardly meet any other guests especially if you will have your breakfasts served in villa (additional surcharge USD 3 for a room service). Spacious and spotless clean rooms with powerful aircon, big and comfy beds, good sized swimming pool and sunloungers and gazebo. Hotel restaurant was reasonably priced and the food was really nice (pork ribs were the best ones). Nice infinity swimming pool at the restaurant area. Happy hours for nice coctails in the evenings. The staff were just superb, friendly and helpful. We inadvertedly "broke" a luxurious toilet that worths 20 millions of rupiahs and they were able to get a new one within few ours at discounted price of 8 millions rupiahs. Jimbaran bay and Uluwatu are approx 20 mins. drive from the resort, Dreamland beach didn´t worth visiting. Kecak dance is too long (90mins) in hot weather and nearly 50% of spectators left the show after 30-40mins. If you want to stay in Bukit peninsula, Mahagiri villas are great place which I´m pleased to recommend to the others.
title: Excellent hotel with outstanding staff

text: When i stayed, the first time i feel was fascinated with the convenience offered by the  staff serve it' s a great atmosfer wholeheartedly..mahagiri villas very comfortable... !!! Well done!!.......!!!
title: Satisfactory Service!

text:
The Hotel is located 40 minutes away from the airport and is in a secluded area. It is not accessible to shopping districts however it does offer a lot of privacy. 

We were given a refreshing welcome drink and a wet towel in due of the hot weather. After which we were escorted to our villa in a buggy where Alit did the rooming. 

We were amazed by the spacious villa (200sqm). Equipped with a private pool (1.4m) 02 sun beds, a kitchenette, an outdoor lounge area with a 5-seater sofa. The room itself comes with a beautiful and comfortable 4-poster bed. The walk-in closet is basic with an In-House safe box. There is a double vanity for both Him & Her. The bathroom comes with a cubicle and a large bathtub. In the villa, there is only 01 shower - the outdoor rain shower (Heavenly).

We ordered In-Room Dinning and unfortunately, the food is not up to our expectation. The taste was bland and I ended up not finishing the meal. At night we left for Seafood Dinner by the Beach which is about 20 minutes drive away.

One thing unique about this hotel is they do not offer Buffet Breakfast. You will be required to fill in a breakfast form and select your options (limited choices) and they will prepare for it at your preferred time at the restaurant. Should you wish to have it delivered to the room, it will be at an additional charge of USD3 per person. Once selected, you are to leave the form outside your villa and the Restaurant staff will collect it at 2230hrs.

During breakfast, we were surprised of the quantity of the meal and the food tasted bland as well. What happens next amazed both my husband & me. Alit, the Restaurant Supervisor approached our table when we are almost done with our meal. He had noticed that I had only touched 20% of my order the night before and if there was something wrong with the meal or if he can rebate my order & even offered me a complimentary meal. I provided honest feedback and refused his offer as I have been blown away at his observation and sincerity. In the next hour, they delivered complimentary cakes to our room as a token of apology. 

On our last night, it has been our tradition to spend massively on In-Room Dinning. So we ordered a 5 person meal for just the 2 of us. The order took 40 minutes to reach. Budi delivered the meal and to our surprised, a complimentary cake for each of us for the wait.

On departure day, we were sent off by Ibu Ayu (Front Office Manager). Very professional and very friendly. In all, if you are looking for a great escape from everything, this is definitely the place. Great service and comfortable rooms.

Just to note :
Reception, In-Room Dinning, Engineering & Housekeeping (& all other departments except for Security) - Close at 2300hrs
Rooms - Total of 15 villas in the hotel
Great Staffs - Budi & Alit from the Restaurant & Ayu from Front Office

Distance to Airport - 40 minutes 
Distance to Kuta - 1hours 15mins
Distance to Ubud - 2hours 15mins
title: Great Escapade

photos.caption: Walkway to outdoor Rain Shower & Pool

text: These villas are fantastic bigger than normal pool and surrounding area than most villas I have stayed in. The villas themselves are most spacious, quiet and the staff excellent.  They are very clean and close to quite a few restaurant on Jl Raya Uluwatu and you are not far from Jimbaran Bay also.  We would stay again and we have already been quite a few times over the last year also family.
title: Beautiful Villas

text: We stayed here for a week in January 2014 and had a wonderfully relaxing holiday.  The villas are located just off the main road JL Raya Uluwatu, but we couldn't hear the traffic.  The surrounding buildings are locals accommodation and the roosters and geese act as an alarm clock.  I have to say that the accommodation was very nice.  We were upgraded to a 3 bed villa, although two of the bedrooms were locked up, not that we needed them.  Just a few little niggles, the usual sort of Bali things.  The food was fine and the staff, in the main, were very pleasant.  A few hints for anyone else who finds this review useful.  There is a Warung at the top of the road "Warung Makken Made" it's on JL Raya Uluwatu, just as you turn off to go the the villas - the food is fantastic and super cheap.  The massage shop a couple of doors up also does a really good massage for 10 times less than the hotel spa.  If you're going to get taxis to Nusa Dua or to Kuta or anywhere else, then be sure you ask them to call you a taxi meter.  The fares are far less than the hotel shuttle costs.  Also be aware that there is a service charge included in all costs.  It seems to be something that is happening more and more across Bali rather than improving the wages of staff.  Of course it does mean that you are obliged to reward everyone even if the service is poor.  But, hey in the scheme of things it's not a lot compared to Aussie costs.
title: Not bad

text:
It was my 40th birthday and first time to Bali!  With no reference point whatsoever I took a chance on this villa and I am thrilled I did!  The staff was amazing and super accommodating not to mention extremely helpful given this was our first time to Bali!  The villa was amazing and uber-spacious, the perfect location for serenity, privacy or a group of friends partying in the comforts of their own space.  

Quiet, calm and serene with all the comforts one would want away from home.  The layout was perfect for a private retreat feel or for gathering.  The main restaurant and pool was refreshing without the touristy feel.

The staff went out of their way to make our stay a dream come true AND memorable with a surprise birthday song, cake and floral arrangement while I was at the front desk.  No request was too big or small for that matter.  Breakfast in the villa at our request, the spa and spa packages provided just the right amount of relaxation to this very special trip.
title: Best Birthday, very accommodating

photos.caption: View of our private pool in our 3 bdrm villa

text: Oh my god. This place was heaven. My girlfriend and I were upgraded upon arrival to the 3 bedroom villa (400sqmt), it was insane, we had more space than we knew what to do with. The building style and quality is local balinese, with a touch of modern, and very tastefully done with very high quality materials. The bed is super comfortable, the private villa pool is clean, wonderful and the perfect temperature. The whole place looks gorgeous at night. The restaurant is situated beautifully with jungle views and nice setting aside the common pool. The staff was very nice and happy giving us a very personal experience, greeting us with warmth every morning, tending to all our needs and giving us recommendations as to where to find secret beaches or other activities. The location is kind of in the middle of no where (which was in no way a problem, what's the point of being in a beautiful private villa if it has to compete for your attention a bustling part of town?) Because of this I highly recommend renting a motorbike so you can get yourself wherever you want (everything is <20min ride from there anyway). The only area for improvement I think would be the food, it was relatively bland and costly as compared to the local warung just on the main street outside. Everything else was so fantastic, we hardly noticed.
title: Amazing villas, welcoming staff

text:
Stayed there for 4 nights with friends and families for my cousin's destination wedding in Aug 2013.  For a 3 bedroom villa with its own private pool, common room and kitchen, price paid for the hotel is fairly decent as compared to other well known hotel chains (ie: Four Seasons, Marriot, Banyan Tree..etc) or the other hotels at Nusa Dua....

Concierge and hotel staffs are very polite and helpful...

Rooms and bathroom is spotless, the entire property is fairly new, less than 2 years old, so everything is still very well maintained and serviced....

Common room comes with kitchen and dining table, kitchen has full sized fridge and microwave and some utensils like forks and spoons...common room has sofas and TV as well

Our friend who went to Bali earlier than the rest of us before she joined us at Mahaghiri, she stayed in another villa which costs more, but she said it wasn't as good coz it wasn't as well maintained as the villas have been established for quite a while...so I guess new and old villas make a difference in Bali....

Decor + Furniture in rooms and bathrooms is exquisite....

Bad point of the villa is that is fairly far away from everything...and Ungasan has not much to offer...but with a full time driver at around USD 50 a day, this shouldn't be problem........

Breakfast buffet is basic, as the restaurant is fairly small since the number of villas at the property is very limited, it is logical that there is no need to offer a wide selection of food...taste and quality of food is average as well.....however the restaurant staffs were very polite and services were good.....

Overall, for those who want a relaxing trip in Bali away from the chaotic Kuta, the hotel is a good choice provided you have a full time driver at all times during your stay.....
title: Stunning for price paid..

text: I went for my honeymoon trip. We stayed for 8 days and it was the best villa ever. I stayed in villa# 102 it was a Three Bedroom Villa and it was an upgrade from the hotel. In my life I went to a lot of hotels but this hotel is one of the best hotels ever I went. The people there are very polite and very helpful. I recommend this hotel for anyone wants a relaxing vacation or honeymoon trip. They have a driver drives you to jimbaran bay and dreamland for free. In jimbaran bay it is a good place for seafood on the beach and to watch the sunset. But be careful that there is a lot of price deference between the restaurants. The driver will always recommend expensive restaurants and places that he takes commission from them. First restaurant was (jbs) which the driver dropped us there I paid nearly 150 $ then after search online I asked the driver to drive us to a restaurant called (lia café ) I paid 37 $ which was the same portion and with the same taste of food like the first one. Also regarding the spa the driver recommended a very expensive one and it was not that good. Although the hotel offered us a free couple massages for 1 hour but actually they stayed more and it was perfect. Note: At the beginning of the street next to the hotel there is a cheap restaurant that serves delicious food with a very good price in front of ck market.
title: Best honeymoon

text:
We've stayed at Mahagiri Dreamland pool-villa for 6 nights and it felt like being on honeymoon once again. I could wish for a more romantic stay with my husband!

Our villa was a truly luxury experience, with open-air living room with TV and kitchen and dining area. And your private pool with two sunbeds! Nothing can compare to waking up in the morning and jumping into your own pool right away. Kitchen has everything one may need: full size fridge, dishes and utensils for cooking etc. The sleeping room has a king-size bed, where I had one of the best hotel sleeps of my life.

The hotel personnel is very attentive, friendly and smiley and do make a special effort to remember each guest by name. The only down side is that the reception lady didn't speak much of an English and therefore was not of much help, when we asked for some travel tips.

Breakfast was tasty though my husband would appreciate some bigger quantities. It's was a la carte breakfast, as in most Bali hotels.

The hotel offers a shuttle bus to nearest beach, but I don't think it's wise to stay at this villa without your own transport, as it is really very far from everything. You have to get prepared that you will have to drive at all times to and from the hotel and the roads are chaotic. But we had a rented car in-spite of all forums telling against it, and we did just fine. It's really fantastic to explore the peninsular by car, stopping by small restaurants and beautiful beaches.

There was a small detail that made us feel weird about the hotel - at the check-in they ask for a money deposit in cash for your possible expenses during your stay. Seemed like a lack of trust towards the guests. Asking for credit card details as a guarantee would be more professional from my point of view.
title: Ideal romantic getaway

photos.caption: Hotel pool in front of the restaurant
View from the bathroom to the private pool

text: We have recently returned from a 3 night stay at the beautiful Mahagiri Dreamland. It was everything we could have wanted and more. We stayed in a 3 Bedroom villa with our 3 children (9,8 and 2 years old)  The villa provided a luxurious, relaxing and  peaceful escape. We loved the outdoor shower and having our very own pool. The staff were amazing and nothing was too much trouble. We were able to organize transport to nearby Uluwatu each day, Dreamland, Padang Padang and stop at shops a long the way. Early breakfast(6.15am) was organized on our last day to make our airport transfer on time. We can not thank Mahagiri enough for making this one of our best Bali holidays yet. We are already planning our return, for a longer stay next time.
title: "Stunning"

text: I can't express how wonderful this hotel was. I'm not a big review writer but I really hope i could influence somebody to stay here because IT WAS THE HOTEL OF MY DREAMS. My boyfriend and I stayed here for 4 nights during our visit to Bali. It was such a pleasant surprise how close it was to the beach! They arranged for a driver to take us to dreamland beach for free- courtesy of the hotel and to pick us back up! Dreamland had huge waves (we dont surf but it was fun to watch the pros) the water was bright clear blue and absolutely breathtaking! It was insanely romantic- having your own private pool was unreal! We are both from Los Angeles, California and have stayed in some pretty nice hotels in our life but absolutely nothing compares to this. And forget how gorgeous, clean, and convenient this hotel is--- the people brought it to an experience of a lifetime! The staff is MINDBLOWING. When we first arrived we thought we were dreaming! THIS IS CUSTOMER SERVICE. I collect shells all of the world from my travels and accidentally left them in the room and didn't realize it until i was already in Ubud. I returned a few days later to see if i could talk to somebody and maybe they put them aside in a lost and found. I met this really nice man in the restaurant and he offered to go downstairs and help us out. Im telling the truth-- 15 men went dumpster diving for me as i cried over my stupidity for leaving my shells. The nice man i met who went downstairs... yeah he was the OWNER. He was unreal! The nicest man ever! We left and we were on the way to the airport and they searched the dumpster for almost 2 hours and FOUND MY SHELLS!!! They drove over and met us and personally delivered them to me. The food is excellent (the best we had in bali actually) We had 2 hour couples massages downstairs in the spa.. wow. This hotel is remarkable, beautiful, stunning, luxurious, tropical, and the people (no joke) were the nicest people i have ever met in my life. Please please please just stop your search and stay here! I wish we didnt even go to Ubud- if i ever go back to bali... I'll just book 2 weeks here and make day trips to other towns! Hope this helps!! :)
title: best hotel in the world- literally.

owner_response.text:
Dear Ms. Marie,

Warm greeting from Mahagiri Villas Dreamland and welcome back home.
On behalf of Mahagiri Staff, Management and owner, saying thank you so much for your stay with us. We hope our service could meet your high standard for your holiday. We do very appreciate for  your honest comment of our property and service. for yo to know, we are always do our best to make our guest can get their satisfaction. and for our appreciation, we always give 10% additional discount from any deal we have for our return guest. so just please contact us at reservation@mahagirivillasdreamland.com
Finally, Thank you very much and have a nice day.

Gusti Bawana
Villa Manager
owner_response.title: Tanggapan Pemilik

text:
Each compound comes with multiple rooms which encircle a small but stylish pool. Also comes with a living and dining area. 

The rooms and bathrooms are well done, with quality finishing. Includes an outside shower (although beware of mozzies) and comfy beds. 

The villas are located close to a busy area, so dogs and roosters can be heard at night. If you are a light sleeper this may not be the place for you. That said, it isn't too isolated which means less traffic for you (depending on where youre going) and is close to food options. 

The breakfast there was fine but nothing to right home about.
title: Perfect for a friends or family trip

text: We found this accommodation by chance and, like some other reviewers, after enjoying its hospitality, facilities, delightful service and privacy, were half tempted to keep its wonderful qualities a secret for friends and family. Everything about the design, furnishing and decor is of the highest quality. The level of privacy, the serenity of the site and the charm of an all-hours private pool made it a stay we won't forget. We'd have liked to stay longer but, being unfamiliar with the villas, had treated it as a stopover rather than a destination. A great place to really get away from it all and unwind; but also close enough to enjoy the dozens of restaurants and shops just a little way back down the hill. We  want to thank the manager and his staff for making our visit so thoroughly enjoyable. Very highly recommended!
title: A great discovery: so peaceful, comfortable and yet close to the buzz.

text:
We had booked a couple of villas, one-bedroom and three-bedroom villas.
I prefer the three-bedroom villa, spacious family room and kitchen.
Kitchen comes with cooktop, microwave and a decent size fridge, no oven.
Clean and safe place with plenty of privacy. Well-maintained property.
You have to climb stairs to get to the reception, the restaurant and the main pool.
Continental breakfast average. We did eat outside, or had local food delivered.
Hire a taxi for day tours.
Ayu arranged late check out on a Saturday.
A big thanks to Ayu and staff.
title: Thank You Ayu!

text:
i stayed there for 10 days in a three bedroom villa with my husband. While the rest of my wedding guests took up the rest of all the other villas for 3 days. In summary: 
- beautiful, modern balinese villa. very nice private pool and public pool. clean and well maintained. 
- extremely spacious and safe 
- excellent service with villa staff. especially Ayu the lady who made the bookings for us, extremely accommodative and so helpful. She goes the extra mile to help in whatever area she can. 
- near to airport 25mins. airport transfer by villa is punctual and very comfortable. 
- good arrangements they make when we need transport 
- quiet but still near to eating places by car 
- massage is average 
- Would recommend food outside of villa as the food quality is average and takes a long time to prepare. 
- lack of children facilities (however not important for young couple like us) 

Overall, we loved the place and the staff. We highly recommend it for couples and young people. Many thanks! We glad to chose this place!
title: Beautiful and clean villa. great service.

text:
My wife and I only stayed here for two night, which was too short. We booked a one bedroom villa and got upgraded to a three bedroom villa. When we entered the villa both of us were speechless, what an accomodation, large separated living room, outside-shower, private pool etc.
The staff is very friendly, doing their best to help you if you have any question.
The location of this place is a bit remote, but you have privacy. In order to travel around you will need a taxi to drive you around. They do offer an airport pick-up and drop off service for free which is extremely convenient. 

Some tips: in the morning if you are in a hurry, order your breakfast on time. It takes around 30 min for them to prepare your meal (atleast you know its fresh;)). The food is quite good.
We took a Balinese massage but it wasn't that great especially when you compare the price they charge you. The days before we stayed in Ubud and we had a similar massage at Zen for around 20 usd for the two of us and here they charged us around 60 usd (for two).
Go to Chiringuito EL KABRON Spanish Restaurant & Cliff Club for a drink during sunset, amazing view from here (reservation is necessary if you want to enjoy dinner during sunset).

Overall, we had a fantastic stay and this was the best way to end our holidays.
title: Beautiful Villa! Wished I could stayed longer

owner_response.text:
Dear Sir,
Thank you very much for your stay with us and for your honest review about our villa.
For your information, we have a value reward for our return guest, so just contact us when you make a booking for your next stay with us. we also have free shuttle service also to go to some beach and close by shopping center at any time. for your breakfast, we have a breakfast form which you can fill up the day before if you want to have on time breakfast.
Finally, on behalf of Staff and Management Mahagiri Villas Dreamland say thank you very much and wishing to see you again next time.
owner_response.title: Tanggapan Pemilik

text:
Thank you very, very much Mahagiri Villas!  We can say that the place is a paradise on the earth! We have travelled a lot, but never experienced anything like this. Our villa was amazing: own pool with outdoor kitchen, dining and living room. Fabulous bedroom and bathroom inside. The outdoor shower was also great. The staff was so excellent - we will sertainly come back!
The happy couple from Finland
title: Thank you!

owner_response.title: Tanggapan Pemilik

text: Me and my wife stayed here last week and it definitely is one of the nicest accommodating villas we have been to in Bali. Because it has recently been built, everything is spotless. We booked in to stay in the one bedroom villa but where instantly upgraded to the 3 bedroom villa! Impressive!! This place has got it all! 3 toilets, 2 outdoor showers, daybed, private pool, kitchen, large fridge........ Everything one needs to put you in the mood...... The staff are extremely polite and helpful, the kitchen at the restaurant is very good! I mean it! It was very good! Day spa is great and the tours and shuttle service prompt and on time. They will organise bookings on your behalf anytime and free airport transfers. We took the Veganza package which included free dinner, 2 hour spa treatment of your choice, free afternoon tea daily, and airport transfers. Well worth it's price! A special thanks goes to the reception staff, our driver Gutra, and of course Alit. He will make you laugh and cheer you up! Thanks Mahagiri for making our trip wonderful!
title: Great place to really unwind and chillax.

text:
What a GREAT VILLA! I don't want to write a review because I'd rather it stay our little secret - great value for money!!

My husband and I stayed in a One Bedroom Villa for 10 nights as a celebration for his 40th birthday (I also had my birthday while we were there).

All of the staff were excellent and wanting to accommodate all of our needs. The staff along with my husband plotted a beautiful suprise for my birthday - what more could a girl ask for! Make sure you let staff know if you're there for something special and they can arrange a great suprise for you too.

They also have available many day trips, car rental, sightseeing tours. But I never wanted to leave! Because there's a mini kitchen and great big fridge I recommend heading out to one of the bigger supermarkets, like Hypermart or Carrefour and stocking up so you can feed yourself and drink cocktails by the side of the pool. (You can also buy alcohol from the bigger supermarkets).
Don't want to head to the shops or be bothered with making lunch - then the room service menu is good value and the meals are good (I was a fan of the pizza)! Or there's a great warung on the corner as you turn into Mahagiri's street. Made's Warung has a HUGE selection of different meals with loads of great healthy vegie dishes - plus it's really cheap. They also do takeway which you could bring back to your villa if all their tables are full :)

The rooms were very clean and spacious. The pool was also very clean. My only complaint - we couldn't stay longer ;)

This is a perfect holiday for those wanting to really relax. It's very private, very quiet, and extremely relaxing! Even though each villa is next door, we never heard anybody else (& the place was full). 

I was also very impressed by having a water galon available instead of buying bottled water. Great way to look after the environment!!

Thank you Mahagiri Dreamland for an unforgetable, unbelievably relaxing holiday :)
title: Shhh, keep this gem a secret ;)

photos.caption: Birthday suprise of fresh flowers and a cake!
And a birthday message on the bed

text: My husband, daughter (16) and myself stayed here 6-13 Feb 2013. We were very warmly welcomed and then shown to our villa, what a wonderful site, our own villa and pool with lounge, kitchen dining. For us this was to be a relaxing week so we didn't have to go anywhere, this villa had everything we needed. There was an army of young guys to clean our villa every day. In the restaurant the staff quickly learnt our names and greeted us by them every day as well as the reception staff.  All in all we were treated like Kings and we had a wonderful week.
title: Wonderful Week

text: Love this place. Beautiful villas in a private quiet setting. Staff are awesome and make your stay as special as they can, they are so helpful and really make the difference. The villas, pool and surrounds are immaculately kept and the smiling team of cleaners come daily to make sure the standard stays high. We stayed in 3 BR villa and it felt very private. Kids loved the pool and its a perfect retreat after a busy day sight seeing or shopping in busy Kuta. Only slight downside is that shopping and most restaurants are not walking distance and it will take 30 mins plus to get into main shopping in kuta. Staff will provide free drop off to some beautiful restaurants and shopping within 10-15 mins which is great but you will pay for transport for anything further away. We did find one restaurant walking distance called fusion and it has beautiful cheap meals. Massages in the spa are fantastic. Highly recommend this place for families or romantic getaway, we will definitely stay here again. Huge thanks to Gusti, Ayu, Ayu, Kana, Alit and our driver Gusti wejaya you guys are the best.
title: Amazing villas

text:
Perfect for us! We prefer being more secluded but still close enough to get our kuta/seminyak fix. Size of the villas are great. Everything is very good quality. The staff are very friendly and always eager to help. The gym is good quality. The staff will drop you off and pick you up whenever required within about 15 min from villas.
We will return!
title: Amazing value for your money! All photos are real not photoshopped!

text: We have just returned from 5 nights in Bali staying at the Mahagiri Dreamland Villas. This was an absolutely beautiful villa, clean, private, and well furnished with a lovely pool. The room service was great, the gardens well maintained, and the facilities excellent. The staff were always smiling, friendly, and exceptionally helpful. The service they provided was outstanding, we had issues with our return airline ticket, and they set to work to sort it out for us. They also offered free transport to and from Dreamland Beach and Jimbaran, which was a wonderful service available whenever we needed it. The food from the resturant was delicious, and again the service was amazing. We traveled with our 9 month old baby and whenever we sat down for a meal, the staff would hold and entertain our baby so we could enjoy our meal. We had a massage from the spa, and they arranged to do it in our villa while our baby was asleep. It was sad to leave such a special place, we will miss the place, people and service greatly. We would recommend this resort to anyone looking for a relaxing private holiday. Thankyou to all the staff at Mahagiri Dreamland resort for making our holiday such an amazing expirience.
title: Simply Amazing

text:
Hi, wow what can i say, we stayed one week at Mahagiri dreamland, got transfer from airport to resort, with a warm welcome by our taxi man, the staff are just fantastic they bend over backwards for you, we stayed in a 3 bedroom suit number 103 which was just gorgous, everything you want its there, the pictures are, what you get just beautiful. the pool is just bliss at anytime a could just jump in morning or night, the rooms were cleaned everyday, as always with a massive smile from the staff, my girls just loved the friendlyness of the staff, the pool,and the outside shower, the staff treat you like family, i felt that anyway, it was very sad to leave, but will be back, and i hope all those beautiful faces are there welcome us again,i recommend this resort to anyone wanting a relaxing time away, just do it, youll totally love it, were going back next time, 
Thanks heaps to the wonderful staff at Mahagiri Resort dreamland, you sure made our week,
Mr Les, Shonna, Shari,Luwana.
our new family.
title: Wow, talk about dreamland.

owner_response.text:
Dear Mr. Les & Fam,

Warm greeting from Mahagiri Villas & Spa Dreamland, and thank you very much for your Stay with us. We will always keep maintaining our standard and service as good as possible to satisfy our Guest. therefor we are very appreciate your honest comment about us. so please keep in touch with us to get up to date information and best deal of Mahagiri Villas & Spa Dreamland.

Best regard,
Gusti Bawana
owner_response.title: Tanggapan Pemilik

text: Check in was very pleasant. First impression was great, room was clean, staff was friendly, spent a few days here with my wife, villas are well designed with beatiful lighting visible at night, I would stay here again, only slight draw back is it is at least 10min drive to nearest beach, breakfast is as good as u will find anywhere in Bali,
title: A wonderful stay!

text:
We arrived to be warmly greeted by a staff, whom I sincerely cannot remember his name. He ushered us to the car where a cold towel and chilled water was served to us. Took less than 30 mins to reach the resort and was blown away by the modern and "zen-ness" of the place.

Had a chat with their counter staff and decided to arrange for a car to bring us to the nearby area for some sight-seeing and snacks shopping. Nice neighborhood to just wander around and have a meal.

We signed up for their promotional couple spa package which was totally worth it! Think it was 4 types of massage which we could stretch out throughout the entirety of our stay. Was so good that we actually planned our programme in Bali around our spa sessions. 

Staff at the cafe was also impeccable. Their friendly smiles and great suggestions certainly made our day! You can even choose to have breakfast sent to your villa if you're villa is a distance away. 

As for the villas, we stayed in the 1-bedroom villa and it was superb! Great value for money.  Thank you Mahagiri Dreamland Villas & Spas for making our long deserved trip a superb one! - Basril Nizam
title: Simply great! Made our anniversary a great one to remember!

text: My wife & I have know Gusti, the manager of Mahagiri for more than 10 years. Gusti's genuine nature is reflected in the service & true Balinese nature that can be experienced in this beautiful meticulously maintained villa complex. The villas are magnificent, the spa staff are very well trained and the restaurant staff could not of been friendlier. I have been to Bali 14 times & could not give a higher recommendation for quality, value or service. Mr Mark
title: Mahagiri true Balinese paradise

text: Hi to all we have just come back from bali and loved it before we went we did months of research on where to stay finally we decided to stay at the mahagiri dreamland and spa which is in ungssan about 20 minutes from the airport we were still not sure as we got closer we were hoping it to be what we saw in the pictures once we got there by the way a driver was sent from the villa to pick us up which was 12 o clock at night we were amazed by the beauty of this place it was picture perfect we absolutely loved our villa and how everything was set up all the staff from reception to room service was excellent despite the little English they were wonderful and very friendly and helpful we have to remember in a foreign country we have to be like the locals that really helps  we enjoyed every thing about this place the spa was excellent and everything was so well organized and clean over all we loved the mahagiri and would go back there without a doubt thank you to all the staff for going out of your way to see to all our needs God bless. Raj and Fiona south Australia
title: Excellent

text:
My family (5 adults and 1 teenager) had 5 wonderful days in a 3-bedroom villa where all its beautifully and completely furnished rooms open out to a private swimming pool with lounging chairs and a garden.  There is also a big, separate living room (also with a flat-screen TV) and a well-equipped kitchen.  Each private bathroom leads out to a garden shower.  The best accommodation we have had in all our trips!

It was really tempting to completely give up our plans to go around Bali and just stay in our beautiful villa!  Should we get another chance to come back, we will certainly stay here and just enjoy the amenities of the place.  

The staff were friendly and accommodating – ever ready to help make our stay as comfortable and as enjoyable as possible.  We enjoyed both buffet and ala carte breakfasts that kept us full during our long drives to various tourist destinations in our list.  Do try the Balinese massage – it is a great experience in itself!  

Our stay at the Mahagiri Dreamland Villas and Spa definitely made our vacation in Bali more enjoyable and memorable.
title: Indulge your family in this little paradise

text:
This place is simply wonderful ! We stayed here for a week.  It is very luxurious and in a very beautiful setting. The villas are new, very clean and the landscaping is simply marvelous. We stayed in the 3 bedroom villa, each room is separated from the other and the very private, sometimes it is too quiet for us city slickers !  The private villa pool is a magnet for the kids. The villas are well designed, it has a lush and beautiful garden around the pool. The living room has a kitchen with more than enough accessories to make a light snack. Each room has a TV and open air bathrooms. 

The staff are extremely friendly and catered to our vegan needs. They responded to our requests with utmost regards. The only issue we had during the stay was the faulty telephone ringing during one of the nights, luckily the staff fixed it the next day. 

The Balinese dance arranged by the staff was very nice. This is not a place to miss. We never had stay in a villa before, and the villa experience is much better than staying in the big resorts. This place has set a high benchmark for luxury. 

We stayed here for a week - wish it could have been longer. 

This is a relatively small place with few villas and less than 6 months old.  There are few mobile and convenience stores nearby, but we hardly used them.  The restaurant serves good food, though sometimes it feels very lonely eating there as the only customers. 

If you are looking for great value for money and total privacy and a villa experience in a new resort. This is the place. 

Hope to visit Bali again and stay here.
title: Wonderful stay at Mahagiri Dreamland

text:
This was the last place we stayed in Bali (and the best by far) we had a private pool villa and it was amazing!! Very clean, had comfy bed, two TV’s, outdoor kitchen/lounge, very quiet and relaxing!! the staff were exceptional, they helped us with anything we needed, booked us tours and came to our room twice a day for housekeeping and to turn the bed down :) the restaurant staff we very friendly and willing to have a chat and always had a smile :) the spa was very professional  and had a great range of services to offer.
The location is right near dreamlands beach and they had free transfers there and back whenever you needed it. If you’re looking for a nice relaxing holiday away from all the commotion of Kuta, this is definitely the place to stay :) AMAZING!!!!
title: AMAZING!!!!!

photos.caption: very comfy bed and mozzie net was great :)

text:
A boutique luxury hotel in the Bukit area which is about 5 min from beaches on Jimbarin/Padang Padang or 5 min from beaches on Nusa Dua side. Same area as Bulgari Hotel etc... This is a very private style of hotel. They had 3 and 1 Bedroom Pool Villas. We stayed in a 3 Bed Villa, it had 3 sep villas within one Villa compound, all opened up to a private pool. Large pool, large backyard. Brand new hotel and all was clean and nice n new. Cheap food in hotel for luxury villas. Great Pizza joint 5 min from hotel in a car, $5-8 pizzas so crispy, you think you were in Italy. Staff are happy to drop and pick up from within 10 min drive from Villas anytime. It's close to the New Kuta Golf Course which they have special prices for the hotel guests. Was great for us playing golf and then being happy to relax peacefully in our own Villa/House while recuperating after playing. They have massage facility in special rooms or in villa. Staff were very friendly. Six of us, three couples. All had our own private room with tv and bathroom each, opening up to our private pool. It cost us $400 au all inc per night with breakfast & transfers, which was for the whole villa. Working out at $66 each per person between us. Still only 15-20 min in taxi to main Kuta/Seminyak area. We hired a nice taxi for $35au for whole day. The villa itself also has another separate structure within each 3bed villa compound, this room has bifolds which can be opened right up or closed off. Tv and large lounge suite, dining table and kitchen all within this room. Dreamland is right next door and plenty of diff restaurants within 5-10 min drive away if wanting a night out.
Already booked our next holiday, would highly recommend these villas, mainly for the quality, size and value for money. Absolutely great for golf enthusiasts!
title: Luxury Private Pool Villas at the right price in new trendy south Bali area!

photos.caption: 3 bed Villa, looking at lounge/kitchen room

text:
My husband and I had a wonderful 2 nights honeymoon stay at their 1 bedroom villa equipped with an awesome private pool, great private outdoor shower and comfortable bedroom.

As this is an extremely new resort (about 3-4mths old), all their amenities are very clean and new. However being new, all their staffs are very professional, friendly and speaks good english. Totally Love their service!! Great service!

They even created a memorable honeymoon "dinner under the stars" for us by decorating our villas with candle and fresh flowers. Food at the restaurant is delicious, even though the choices are quite limited. However, the hotel staffs recommended us to a nearby restaurant (about 5 min drive away) named Ga Ra Si which offers great food and wide selection of wine and beverages. 

Location of the villa may not be the best, but the hotel staffs are always ready to provide free shuttle/transportation to places we wanted to go. The villa is about 10 min drive to dreamland beach and about 20min drive to Nusa Dua. 

Overall, it was a great honeymoon experience at Mahagiri Dreamland and my husband and I will definitely want to go back there again soon! 3 days stay is simply just too short!
title: A Dreamland for Honeymoon...

text: Heaven in bali,i stayed for 3 nights together with my wife,,it was so peaceful,,treated as a king with a peofessional staff,breakfast is completely perfect,,waht i felt is all perfect,,hope i could stay there in my next trip...
title: Heaven in bali

text: Thoroughly enjoyed my stay, extremely friendly staff that made me feel welcome the moment i arrived, would reccomend it to anyone who is looking for a relaxing break. 10/10!
title: Magnificent Villas.

text:
En poussant la porte de villa mahagiri on entre dans un havre de paix. Ici tout est empreint de tranquillité. Le lieu, au calme offre une retraite paisible après une journée de visites. C’est beau et on s’y sent comme chez soi. Le personnel, attentionné est aux petits soins pour faire de notre séjour un moment inoubliable. 
Merci à toute l’équipe pour le soin apporté à notre séjour avec une mention spéciale à Dewi a l’heure des petits déjeuners.
title: Un moment à part

text: 早餐超級好吃，套餐形式，至少有十幾種選擇的早餐，從美式早餐、當地早餐、到鬆餅都有，房內泳池乾淨，好友一起在泳池邊喝酒聊天真的很舒服，但是這家的wifi不太穩定，但是整體而言還算不錯！
title: Breakfast very good

text: Nous avons passé notre première nuit à Bali dans une villa de Mahigiri. Nous avons été divinement bien accueillis, le personnel est très gentil et à l'écoute de vos moindres besoins. Les villas sont très spacieuses, parfaitement équipés et joliment décorées. Pour un séjour en toute quiétude, foncez!
title: Magnifiques villas luxueuses

text: Ved første øjekast ser stedet indbydende og flot ud, personalet er meget venlige og vil gerne snakke og lære dered gæster at kende. Villaerne er super flotte, helt private, har egen pool, køkken, kabel-tv, badekar, udendørs bruser med mere.. Vi fik også benyttet deres fitnessrum og deres gratis shuttlebusser ud for at spise i nærområdet. Det var helt fantastisk at bo der de 3 nætter vi gjorde, og vil bestemt anbefale alle der overvejer, at gøre det. Max afslapning :-)
title: Alt er bare i orden

text:
Nous avons eu la chance de découvrir cette magnifique villa grâce à Budy, qui était au petit soin avec nous tout au long de notre séjour, il a tout mis en oeuvre pour que notre séjour au Mahagiri Villas Dreamland soit inoubliable et il a réussi!!!
Toute l'équipe a fait la surprise à mon conjoint en lui souhaitant son anniversaire avec un beau gâteau et en lui chantant happy birthday un très beau geste qu'il se souviendra ;)
De plus Budi a pris le temps de nous aider lors de notre activité pour nager avec les dauphins un moment inoubliable!!!
La villa est époustouflante tout est mis à notre disposition pour passer un moment relaxant et magique!!!
title: Villa paradisiaque!!!

text: Nous avons choisi cet établissement pour terminer notre séjour en beauté et ne nous sommes pas trompés ! Villa très spacieuse, luxueuse, chaque chambre a sa salle de bains composée d'une baignoire et d'une douche extérieure. Tout est magnifique et parfaitement entretenu, la piscine privée est plutôt grande. Le petit-déjeuner est savoureux, avec un choix très varié. Le personnel est toujours souriant et prêt à rendre service. Merci à Kana pour sa bonne humeur communicative, sa gentillesse, le fait qu'il se rappelle toujours de chacun de nos prénoms, bravo ! Au check-out, visite de la directrice des ressources humaines avec petit cadeau, c'est toujours plaisant. Merci à toute l'équipe, nous avons merveilleusement bien terminé notre séjour.
title: Magique !

text:
كانت تجربة مميزة في هذا المنتجع جميل جدا لوجود مسبح خاص لكل غرفة وكان الاستقبال بشوش ومبتسم وتقديم العصير اول ماحجزنا
السلبيات في هذا المنتجع بعيد عن الخدمات وكذالك وجبة الافطار كله اكل اندونيسي بالنسبة للحشرات النامس والوزغ .
لكن لي عودة لهذا المنتجع الجميل
title: اهلاً بالي 😍

text:
Wij hebben hier 15 dagen verbleven en vonden alles gewoon perfect. 
Van dag 1 spreekt het voltallige team (zowel housekeeping,keukenpersoneel, receptie,... dus de volledige staff) zowel mij als mijn vrouw zeer respectvol maar toch familiair aan met onze voornaam. 
Men doet er letterlijk alles aan om je verblijf volledig gepersonaliseerd en naar jou zin te maken. 
Bvb toen men zag dat mijn vrouw 2 dagen op rij de pitten uit haar druiven haalde. Kregen wij alle dagen erna ontpitte druiven. 😜. 
Een echte a la carte service. Smorgens en savonds komt men wanneer het jou past je kamer grondig reinigen en je bedje klaar maken om te gaan slapen. 
Wij wilden enkele malen een scooter huren, belden hiervoor naar de receptie en letterlijk maximum 15minuten later stond een mooie honda 125cc voor de deur met 2 helmen en dit voor slechts 5€ voor een ganse dag. 
Er is een shuttle die je tot aan het strand, restaurants of supermarkt voert. 
Mooie golfwagen om je naar je kamer te voeren met je koffers. 
Het personeel staat steeds met raad en daad klaar voor jou en dit heel duidelijk uit oprechte vriendelijkheid want wij hebben pas op het einde zonder dat men het verwachtte iedereen een tip gegeven. 
Iedere dag ontbijt vers a la cart. (Je kon dit de avond ervoor zelf samenstellen volledig naar keuze.)
Ook de keuken waar wij soms gerechtjes van naar de kamer lieten komen is van steak,cordonblue, pizza, pasta, tot lokale gerechten zeer zeer lekker. 
Als u onze andere beoordelingen bekijkt zult u zien dat we wel al wat gewoon zijn, dus dat dit een ECHTE aaanrader is en wij hier geen minpuntjes vonden betekent echt wel iets.
title: Amazing good hotel

text:
1歳の子連れ夫婦で4泊しました。一泊あたり日本円で18000円ぐらい。プール付きヴィラですがお得です。主要な観光地、ショッピングエリアからは遠いので、サーフィン以外でアクティブに過ごしたい方には向いていません。ジンバランとドリームランドビーチには無料送迎あり。それ以外でも時間が合えば無料送迎してくれました。
3〜4分歩くとランドリー、コンビニ3つ、外国人向けのワルンが数店あります。ホテルのレストランは美味しいですがナシゴレン60000IDRぐらいかな。高くはないけど近所のワルンはもっと美味しくて25000IDRでした。
朝起きて朝食をヴィラで食べて(前日夜10:30までに朝食オーダー用の紙をヴィラのポストに入れて注文する仕組み。併設レストランかヴィラで食べるか選択できます)、プールで遊んで、ランドリーに洗濯物を出して(1kgで6000IDR)昼は近くのワルンで持ち帰り、昼寝して海で遊んで夜はジンバランあたりでディナー、という生活をしていました。部屋数が多くないので、個別のオーダーにも時間が合えば対応してくれます。
なお、スパ併設ですがセラピストは近くに住んでる普通のおばさんで、私がスパ予約をしてから空いてる人がアサインされてやってくる感じ。ヴィラでも施術受けれますが、腕はセラピストによってピンキリ。遠くても評判の良いスパに行った方が良いです。
title: プール付きヴィラでのんびり滞在するならオススメ

text: 每間房內都有自己獨立的泳池，也有客廳和廚房，早上的早餐可以選在自己別墅用餐，十分寫意。店員服務很好。但是距離市中心較遠。
title: 舒適的度假酒店

text: Nous avons passe 9 nuits dans une villa 3 chambres...c etait tout simplement sublime !!! Le personne de l hotel est au petit soin et tres gentil, tres belle villa avec une superble piscine !! le calme absolu ! Encore une fois personnel tres gentil et c est pour cette raison que l on est reste les 8 nuits.
title: villa de reve !!!

text:
Das Hotel war wirklich genial. Schon die im Buchungspaket inbegriffene Abholung vom Airport funktionierte einwandfrei. Man wurde freundlichst im Namen von Mahagiri Villas empfangen. Sofort bei der Ankunft im Hotel, welches etwa 30 Minuten Fahrzeit vom Airport in Denpasar entfernt ist, wurden wir außergewöhnlich freundlich und herzlich empfangen und sofort unserer Villa zugewiesen um dort mal mit einer Fußmassage und einem erfrischenden Exotikdrink verwöhnt zu werden. Die Anlage besteht zur Zeit aus 7 Villen, wobei jede in einem uneinsehbaren Bereich, über einen offenen Wohnraum mit Küche, einem Außenpool und einer Außendusche sowie einem Bungalow mit Schlafzimmer und Bad besteht. Die Ausstattung ist hervorragend. Die Villa war sauber und gepflegt und der eigene Pool ein Traum. Auf die tägliche Reinigung der Räumlichkeiten sowie der Schädlingsbekämpfung wurde großer Wert gelegt. Auch die komplette Anlage im Mahagiri Resort machte einen stets gepflegten Eindruck. Die Küche ebenfalls in einem 1A Zustand. Auf Hygiene wird hier viel Wert gelegt. Das Personal ist vom Hauskeeping bis zum Manager durchgehend freundlich und die Belegschaft kommt jedem Gast in familiärer Weise in jeder Hinsicht entgegen. Egal ob im Restaurant, das äußerst gute regionale Gerichte sowie tolle Mixgetränke anbietet, oder in der Lobby, wo man stets bemüht ist, dem Gast mit Rat und Tat betreffend Ausflugstouren, Taxi´s, Guides oder Tipps für günstige Einkäufe zur Seite zu stehen sowie im Wellnessbereich, wo geschulte Masseusen bemüht sind, die balinesische Massage und viele andere Verwöhnprogramme anzubieten. Besonders das Personal im Restaurant möchten wir an dieser Stelle hervorheben. Sie sind uns durch ihre herzliche Art sogar gute Freunde geworden.
Aus all diesen Gründen können wir dieses Hotel jederzeit weiter empfehlen. Jeder der hier her kommt, kann sicher sein, dass er von Kopf bis Fuss verwöhnt wird.
Wir bedanken uns deshalb ganz herzlich bei der gesamten Belegschaft der Mahagiri Villas und werden bestimmt wieder kommen!
Noch kurz zur Umgebung und Lage des Hotels - ein kleiner Nachteil ist vielleicht, dass dieses Hotel in einem etwas abgelegenen aber ruhigen Teil Balis liegt, was geplante Touren etwas erschwert, da auf Grund des intensiven Straßenverkehrs in Bali (viele Krafträder und Autos), die Sehenswürdigkeiten etwas mühsam zu erreichen sind. Man sollte für eine Strecke von etwa 40 km durchaus 2-3 Stunden Fahrtzeit einplanen. 
Zum Wetter - wir reisten im Februar, trotz Regenzeit war dies aber kein Problem, denn es hatte trotzdem 31° und bei einem 3wöchigem Aufenthalt regnete es teilweise 3 Tage lang. Aufpassen heißt es in den Money-Change Wechselstuben, da hier beinahe jeder versucht, nicht den korrekten Betrag auszuzahlen. Bei Abhebung mit Kreditkarte oder Maestro sollte man nur die mit ATM gekennzeichneten Automaten wählen. Auch bei Taxis sollte man am Besten auf Taxis mit Taxameter achten, vorzüglich die "Bluebird Taxi" sind zu empfehlen.
Falls man sich jedoch ein sauberes Reiseziel erhofft, sollte man sich hier nicht zuviel erwarten, denn auf Sauberkeit auf den Straßen wird auf Bali leider nicht viel Wert gelegt. Hingegen sind Hotels und Restaurants sauber und hygienisch. Auch die Speisen, die auf der Straße verkauft werden sind durchaus ok. Mein letzter Tipp, wer shoppen geht der sollte unbedingt handeln, denn dies ist auch Bali üblich, dadurch kann man wirklich sehr sehr billig einkaufen.
title: Ein Traumhotel

photos.caption: Unsere guten Seelen im Hotel Mahagiri Villas
Unser Abschied von Mahagiri Villas - Vielen Dank!

text:
Nous avons choisi ce resort pour terminer en beauté notre séjour à Bali. 
L'accueil est véritablement personnalisé, chaleureux et raffiné.
Les villas sont conformes aux photos du site : luxueuses et spacieuses.
Nous avons été installés dans une plus grande villa de trois chambres au lieu d'une seule, en l'absence de vila à chambre unique disponible.
La salle de bains ouverte sur l'extérieur est pourvue d'une grande baignoire (interieure) et douche (exterieure) entourée de végétation. C'est sublime.
Petit-déjeuner de qualité dont la commande doit être faite la veille. La cuisine est dans l'ensemble de bonne qualité, sans être extraordinaire.
Literie d'excellente qualité.
L'attention, la gentillesse et la discrétion du personnel sont dignes d'un palace.
Le seul point négatif de cet établissement est sa situation, loin de tout, de telle sorte que le deplacement à pieds n'est pas envisageable.
Néanmoins il a été mis à notre disposition un chauffeur qui nous a accompagné gratuitement à Jimbaran beach pour dîner à deux reprises en nous récupérant à l'heure de notre choix, puis à l'aéroport le dernier jour. Ces attentions sont vraiment remarquables et permettent d'atténuer ce problème.
title: Des prestations bien au-delà de nos attentes

text:
Se volete una villa da film... Venite qui!
Piscina privata stupenda, giardino, camera matrimoniale, cabina armadio, bagno con doccia favolosa all'APERTO per potersi fare letteralmente una doccia sotto le stelle!
Living Room con divano gigante, cucina, tavolo da pranzo e TV. 
Detto questo, 5 stelle piene per la villa. 

Servizio invece un po' meno all'altezza, e si merita 4 stelle. Manca il classico concierge di riferimento dei grandi hotel che è felice di soddisfare al meglio le richieste dei propri ospiti. Qui non abbiamo trovato questo. 

Consigliamo di noleggiare un motorino per poter visitare agevolmente e liberamente tutte le spiagge della costa (la più vicina è dreamland a 10 minuti) fino ad arrivare al tempio di Uluwatu (25 minuti)

Per la sera invece conviene spostarsi con taxi (mi raccomando chiedete di azionare il tassametro!) o di chiedere al ristorante se offrono il servizio di navetta andata e ritorno. 
In alternativa l'hotel offre gratuitamente il servizio di trasporto ma fino alle 20 e conviene richiederlo con largo anticipo per evitare che lo chieda qualche altro cliente (hanno 2 macchine e basta) e che vi dicano di prenotarvi un taxi (come è successo a noi la prima sera)
title: Villa da film

text: Estuve alojado en Mahagiri Dreamland en mi luna de miel, un lugar con mucha intimidad y muy lujoso. Tiene piscina privada, una habitación muy amplia y un baño muy bien decorado con salida a la piscina. Es ideal si se quiere uno ubicar en la parte sur de la isla porque esta cerca de muchos surf spots. El servicio es excelente y la comida también!
title: Paraíso Balines

text: De villa's zijn ruim en smaakvol ingericht. Heerlijk verblijf in rustige omgeving. De medewerkers zijn uiterst vriendelijk; perfecte service! Ook het eten zowel ontbijt en diner is excellent. Ik kom hier zeker weer terug. Thanks for the lovely stay at your villas.
title: Prachtige villa en uitstekende service

text: Wir haben die 3 Betten Villas gebucht und wurden sehr Herzlich empfangen. Die Villa ist sehr gross, sauber und mit Hochwertigen Materialien ausgestattet! Sehr schöner Privat Pool mit Aussenduschen und wunderschönem Garten. Der "Livingroom" hat alles was man sich wünschen kann: LCD TV grosses Sofa, Esstisch und eine sehr Edle und geräumige Küche mit Gasherd! Das Personal ist zuvorkommend und sehr Freundlich! Wir fühlten uns wohl. Dieses Hotel / Villas bieten für diese grösse, Ausstattung und Qualität ein unglaubliches Preis / Leistungsverhältnis ! Wir kommen garantiert wieder und ich kann es nur jedem empfehlen! Einfach nur Grandios.
title: Dreamland ist Programm

owner_response.text:
Dear Brodwurschtmafia,
 Thank you so much for using our service while your holiday in Bali. We will always maintain and improve our service to the future.

Best Regard
Gusti Bawana
owner_response.title: Tanggapan Pemilik

text:
Io, mio marito ed il nostro bimbo di quattro anni abbiamo soggiornato nella Villa per una settimana. La stanza è meravigliosa, in perfetto stile balinese e avere la piscina tutta per noi è stata davvero una grande emozione!
Il personale è molto capace, dolce e ti fa sentire veramente a casa. Ambienti puliti e cucina varia e di qualità. Dal Resort ci sono navette gratuite per l'aeroporto e le spiagge vicine. Abbiamo lasciato il cuore in questa meravigliosa struttura e ci siamo ripromessi di tornare l'anno prossimo!
title: Splendide ville

text:
刚刚回到悉尼的家中，便制止不住的冲动到网上写点什么，写点关于我和我的丈夫在巴厘岛度假住在Mahagiri Villas度假村的亲身感受。
这个度假村有着极其优雅高品位、高质量的建筑设施和环境，工作人员训练有素，服务很到位，度假村的饭菜很具特色，且价格不贵。
住在度假村，我们乐此忘蜀，我们只有三天外出旅游，大部分时间我丈夫不愿外出，情愿呆在度假村里享受那种悠闲舒适的恬淡时光和酒店烹饪的美食。
过去，丈夫不喜欢在自己家的后院里安装游泳池，然而，度假村的游泳设施给了我丈夫新的启示，在他尽享游泳的快乐后，他断然决定，要在自己的后院里，修建度假村式样的游泳池。
昨天，我丈夫不太相信时间已是告别的时刻，说时间过得太快了，遗憾之后，决定明年再来巴厘岛，再到Mahagiri Villas度假，享受人间天堂般的幸福时光！
lily
title: Mahagiri Villas 天堂假日度假村

text:
こじんまりとしたヴィラです。１BRと３BRがありすべてプライベートプール付きです。
朝食はレストランでいくつかのセットメニューから選ぶのですが、洋食を選ぶと少し物足りない感じがしますがインドネシアの朝食は満足できます。宿泊客が多い日はビュッフェでした。
ルームサービスを含め、レストランがもう少し充実していればよいのにと思いました。
あらかじめ到着便、出発便を知らせておけば、空港送迎は無料です。
近くのスーパーやビーチにも無料で送迎してくれます。ただし日本語は通じません。
小さなヴィラなので、とてもフレンドリーで、また個別にリクエストに答えてもらえるのはとてもよかったです。
スパはいまひとつでした。
title: 総合的にはよかったかな

text:
ماذا يسعني ان اقول عن هذا المنتجع انه رائع بكل ماتحمله هذه الكلمة تعامل رائع من الموظفين خصوصية تامة نظافة يومية 
موقع هادئ سعر جيد جداً يحاول الجميع هناك كسب رضاك بجميع الطرق عشت انا وعائلتي افضل اللحظات وأتمنى العودة هناك مرة أخرى
title: في قمة الروعة

text:
Lavoravo in Indonesia a Jakarta e cercavo un posto dove passare un weekend lungo per ricaricare le pile! Ho trovato un posto tranquillo, accogliente dove riposarmi... Mi hanno veramente coccolato e aiutato in tutto!
Mi hanno persino trovato una moto a noleggio per girare per l'isola!
title: Sosta purtroppo breve

text:
Ma femme et moi venons de passé 12 nuits dans cet hotel, les villas sont recentes et très belles, le personnel y est accueillant.
En revanche, l'hotel est tres mal situé en plein milieu de la presque ile et loin de la premiere plage propre ( public beach de nusa dua à environ 30 minutes de route ) la plage à proximité de l'hotel ( dreamland beach ) est vraiment trés sale. L'hotel se trouve également à coté d'une boite de nuit locale ( musique jusqu'à 3 ou 4h du mat lors des ceremonies qui sont tres nombreuses à Bali )
De plus, du fait de son isolement, impossible de trouver un taxi ou un bemo pour se deplacer, il faut donc utiliser une navette de l'hotel ( tres cheres pour bali )
Enfin, le petit déjeuner est tres moyen ( continental ou americain ), le moindre jus de fruit y est payant ! Nous avons essayé le restaurant de l'hotel, celui ci est tres decevant.
title: sejour mitigé
